direction.raw_text: . THE BASTILLE - PARIS - NIGHT A HEAVY NIGHT MIST swirls around the imposing stone walls of the Bastille. PRISON GUARDS patrol outside with their pikes as the SCREAMS OF PRISONERS echo out the barred windows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : PARIS, 1641 INT. PRISON BLOCK - BASTILLE PRISON - NIGHT A pair of huge PRISON GUARDS walk down a row of filthy prison cells. Whimpering, starving PRISONERS appear and disappear in the flickering light of the wall torches. A large rat nibbles some stale bread in the corner, watching the guards. Finally, the two guards reach a cell whose PRISONER is not at all whimpering or starving. A huge Scotsman with a proud defiance in his eyes, a RED SQUARE MEDALLION dangling around his neck, glares through the bars. This is JAMES McCULLEN. The guards unlock his cell door, MATCHLOCK MUSKETS at the ready. McCullen stares at the muskets, unimpressed. He speaks with a thick Scottish brogue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still using matchlocks, are ya? I can get you a pair of flintlocks, you let me sneak out of here. Everyone else in this sequence speaks with a French accent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #1 (TEMPTED) Good ones? The other Guard glares at him. McCullen goes for the kill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The best. From Spain. And perhaps a couple of pretty young ladies to teach you how to use them. Guard #1 is even more tempted, but his partner is a Loyalist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #2 On yer feet, you Scottish pig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huge, sweaty, bare-chested PRISON WORKERS mould something in a furnace, a large chunk of metal in their red hot tongs. The two prison guards muscle McCullen into the room and start to fasten him to a standing rack as a PRIEST begins reciting the Lord's Prayer in Latin. The Warden steps up and reads the charges off a SCROLL OF PAPER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: James McCullen, you have been found guilty of treason for the sale of military arms to the enemies of our Lord King Louis XIII... even whilst you sold arms to our Lord himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your King is a vile bag of filth who murders his own allies. I should've charged him double.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You tried to overthrow the Crown in conspiracy with its enemies!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They offered me a Chancellorship, because unlike your simpleton King, they know that is the McCullen destiny, to run the wars, the true power, not simply to supply arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have anything else to say before the sentence is carried out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I do. Clan McCullen is far bigger and more powerful than any of you could ever imagine. My sons will continue to rise along after I am gone. As will their sons. And, God willing, their sons. (SMILES) It shall not end with my death. The Warden smiles back sinisterly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, we're not going to kill you, McCullen. We're going to make an example of you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Warden gives a nod to the prison workers who remove the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from the fire. McCullen sees what it is before we do and his face fills with fear. It's a METAL MASK being carried towards him, the hinges open with a hideous creak. McCullen begins to struggle against the rack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So that no man, woman, nor child may ever see your treacherous face again, you shall wear this mask for the term of your natural life. The mask closes around his face. The workers melt the lock. McCullen SCREAMS. AND WE PUSH IN on the RED SQUARE MEDALLION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The many flags of NATO flap outside its massive headquarters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : NATO HEADQUARTERS, BELGIUM MCCULLEN (V.0.) War used to be the exception. Now it is the new state of play, a constant, unavoidable...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The RED SQUARE MEDALLION around the neck of JAMES McCULLEN, gazing over a lectern in a darkened room. Like his doomed ancestor, McCullen carries a proud defiance in his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tragic as they are to fight, wars must be won. But perhaps they don't have to be as destructive as they've been in the past.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rolls continuously on a screen behind him. McCullen is briefing twenty-two NATO MILITARY COMMANDERS, many of them listening in TRANSLATION HEADPHONES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nano-mites. Perfect little soldiers. Their size can be programmed as well as their intended task. Originally developed to isolate and destroy cancer cells, but at Mars Industries, and with the help of a little NATO funding...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A few laughs around the room. McCullen soaks it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .we discovered how to program them to eliminate most anything. For instance... metal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : A SOLDIER fires a shoulder-launched missile at a tank. The warhead bursts into millions of SILVER MICROSCOPIC NANO-MITES which eat away the metal like piranhas devouring a horse. Then the NANO-MITES fan out from the consumed tank and quickly head for a nearby jeep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Once the target has been destroyed, the launcher triggers a kill switch unique to each warhead that short- circuits the nano-mites, preventing any unwanted destruction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : The Soldier hits a KILL SWITCH on the launcher and the NANO-MITES instantly "drop dead" around the nearby jeep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Each warhead contains seven million nano-mites and has the ability to eat anything from a single tank to an entire city. (to consummate salesman) But without innocent casualties. Which is why this has been such a priority for me and my company. The room breaks into APPLAUSE. FOCUSES ON GENERAL HAWK, a British veteran or countless battles, not buying it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guess you'll be the first arms dealer up for the Nobel Peace Prize. Laughter in the room. McCullen smiles, being a good sport.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I prefer the term "armament solutions engineer" (more chuckles) Gentlemen! I'm pleased to announce that tomorrow morning your first order of nanotech warheads will ship from my factory in Kyrgyzstan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: each the size of a softball, are placed into four separate compartments inside a WEAPONS CASE by a pair of LAB WORKERS. The KILL SWITCHES are secured next to each warhead. As the case is closed and locked we see the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Industries RED SQUARE MEDALLION LOGO on its cover.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: NIGHT A PAIR OF DOG TAGS

direction.raw_text: : KYRGYZSTAN, CENTRAL ASIA INT. MEN'S ROOM - MARS FACTORY - NIGHT A PAIR OF DOG TAGS drop INTO FRAME in SLOW MOTION. We see the name: "HAUSER, CONRAD R." Still not seeing his face, we watch our soldier strap into his BODY ARMOR and clip on his BATTLE HARNESS. His NAME TAG simply reads: "DUKE". He loads his into the mirror (is that a look of disdain?) and we get our first glimpse of our hero, a handsome, rugged combat veteran with a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: under his right eye. The sound of RETCHING comes from the stall behind Duke. There is a flush and a strapping young Special Forces Soldier,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: steps out. He goes to the sink next to Duke and splashes water on his face. He's pale and sweaty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hell's wrong with you, Stalworth, you didn't eat that Chicken A La King at chow did ya?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The mission, sir...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about it? Another day, another run.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never had anything to worry about before. Stalworth's shaky hand pulls a photo out and shows it to Duke: A YOUNG MOTHER with a NEWBORN in her arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three weeks old. Be seeing him for the first time next leave. Duke looks at the picture, then at Stalworth. His eyes go distant thinking about his own past, then they harden again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're off the mission.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what you want, right? Stalworth doesn't argue. Duke hands him back the photo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If your head's with them, you're no good to me. Stalworth nods. Duke steps closer, now one mean s.o.b.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One thing, though: you step off this one, you're out of Special Forces. Gonna find you a nice desk and chair back at the base. You're be run of the mill. Regular.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... I guess I can live with that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then you should. Stalworth nods, grabs his kit, and leaves. Duke's hard eyes watch him go, then a slight smile creases his lips ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McCullen exits the briefing room into the corridor outside, shaking hands with various Military Commanders. Hawk watches with his aide, a gorgeous German Lieutenant, COURTNEY "COVER GIRL" KRIEGER. When McCullen is alone, Hawk makes his move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr McCullen, Clayton Aernathy, British Army.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shaking hands) I know who you are General hawk. As sharp in a briefing room as your reputation is on the battlefield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not hardly ...You gave me a broad target, I couldn't resist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's an honor to meet a man of your many accomplishments. McCullen smiles, then offers Hawk to walk with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's on your mind, General?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your warheads. Securing them in transit. Forty pairs of ears in that room now know the when and where.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those "ears" all have top security clearance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We both know what that's worth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, General, delivery is my responsibility and it's not one I take lightly. I had NATO assign an elite American Special Forces unit, a fully armored convoy with air support. I assure you, my warheads will be quite safe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've made a career of showing up where I'm needed, whether ordered to or not. And if your warheads are half as effective as you say they are.. Then my unit is needed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is no time to play catch up. The NATO team's been drilling for weeks. They're lit up and ready to roll.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My unit doesn't need mission specific training. They're chosen because of their ability to handle any situation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe next time, General... (moves to go, stops) What did you say your unit was called?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't. I just said they were always ready. McCullen continues on down the hall. Hawk gives Cover Girl a look, she reads it and nods. WE SMASH CUT TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: escorts two LAB WORKERS as they enter a high-tech delivery bay and wlak past two "COUGAR" PATROL VEHICLES and a huge ARMORED "GRIZZLY TRUCK, all armed with state-of-the-art rooftop weapons. FIFTEEN SPECIAL FORCES SOLDIERS stand at attention in front of Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, listen up, the Cougars will be front and back, Grizzly in the middle carrying the package. Minimum distance at all times. Choppers will cover us overhead. The Lab Workers step up.

Duke turns to them and start signing forms as WALLACE "RIPCORD" WEEMS takes the case while a little short on academic credentials, Rip is long on confidence, charm, and courage. direction.raw_text: (dead serious) They're not weaponized yet. And the kill switches are attached to the launchers. All the same, I'd avoid potholes if I were you. Ripcord stares, then quickly hand the case off to another soldier. Duke shoots him a look and Ripcord shrugs, what?

direction.raw_text: ! Duke gives Rip another look. Rip throws him a cheesy grin. The team mounts up. The weapons case to Grizzly. ENGINES ignite. HEADLIGHTS beam. And the convoy rolls out.

direction.raw_text: Just saying, you know, if I ran things...

direction.raw_text: Rip, if you ran the Army we'd stay up all night, fill our canteen with tequila, and call each other "Bro".

direction.raw_text: But we'd be badasses, right Bro?

direction.raw_text: (with a sigh) Yeah, we'd be badasses. Eyes on the road, Rip.

direction.raw_text: The two Blackhawks sweep through the skies, silhouetted by the rising sun. Below them, the convoy is thundering down a winding road amid the magnificent Tian Shan Mountain Range.

direction.raw_text: on the rear Cougar sweeps vigilantly. Inside, a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: watches the RADAR MONITOR, clear except for two steady :signatures", the Blackhawks.

direction.raw_text: Keep your eyes on the road, Rip.

direction.raw_text: Don't listen to 'em. you got plenty of thoughts up there. (into radio) Keep rear security tight, boys.

direction.raw_text: Well, the second I try and make myself not have thoughts, I always have 'em. Like now, know what I'm thinking about?

direction.raw_text: You were done with it, not me. Look, I loev flying... Duke "mouths" the following sentence as Ropcord says it:

direction.raw_text: I've been flying since I was thirteen years old. Ripcord shoots him a look. Duke just smiles.

direction.raw_text: I don't think your daddy's crop duster counts as hours logged.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jets, man, jets. You know I always qualify when I'm on leave.

direction.raw_text: Yeah, yeah, look, you want to get up in the air, we'll get you a trampoline back at the base.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've done ten years in the Army, I just think we should see if the grass really is greener.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This continues to be the stupidest idea you've ever come up with, nd that's saying something.

direction.raw_text: Funny. Real funny.

direction.raw_text: I don't wanna transfer to the Air Force, okay?

direction.raw_text: It's always about you, isn't it? Give me one good reason?

direction.raw_text: I want to be in the fight, not flying over it.

direction.raw_text: Won't be saying that when you call in an air strike and I come screaming in to save your--

direction.raw_text: --Eyes on the road, Rip.

direction.raw_text: Too late. CONCUSSION CANNONS slide out of ports on both sides of the dark shape. They fire simultaneously. The SUBATOMIC BLASTS punch into the front Blackhawk, crushing it like a beer can on your forehead. It explodes and drops.

direction.raw_text: (urgent, but utterly calm) Back up! Back up! Back up! (into radio) Mother Goose, this is Bird Dog. We are under attack. Repeat --we are under attack!

direction.raw_text: The second Blackhawk pivots to see the dark shape, --it's like a giant helicopter without rotors, hovering on six JET THRUSTERS. It's a next-gen "TYPHOON" GUNSHIP. The Blackhawk hoses the Typhoon with its six-barrelled MINI- GUNS. But the rounds bounce off the Typhoon's angled armor. The CONCUSSION CANNONS fire at the second Blackhawk, catching it on the nose, crushing it into a flaming ball and sending it reeling ass-over-tail-rotor into the ground behind the rear Cougar, hemming in the convoy. The Grizzly launches two HEAT-SEEKING MISSILES off its roof- turret, but the Typhoon guns them down and fires again. The blast lands directly on top of the rear Cougar, literally flattening it as well as every tree within a hundred feet.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: jumps out of the Howler wearing a computerized SURVEILLANCE SUIT, a French/Tunisian ACCENT:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please hand over the case, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know who you are, and I sure as hell don't know who they are, and until I find out, I'm not lowering anything or handling anything over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . They turn to see Ripcord shouldering a rifle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your unit?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's classified. Snake-Eyes discreetly grabs SHRUNKEN THROWING STARS from his belt, but a look from Scarlett makes him out them back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone would like a word with you. Breaker sets a holo-projector on the ground in front of Duke, which projects a 3D IMAGE OF GENERAL HAWK. Duke is stunned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: State you name and rank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .you first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My team just saved your life. now's the part where you say "thank you".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those aren't the words that come to mind just now. We weren't told about any support for this mission, so you better tell your team to stand down. Ripcord eyes his sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Happy to turn this into a turkey shoot. Someone OFF-PROJECTOR hands Hawk a file, he looks at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must be... Ripcord, expert marksman, weapons specialist, jet
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Duke) Told ya.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm General Clayton Abernathy. You may have heard of me, .Duke. A glint of recognition flickers across Duke's eyes, he nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: General hawk. Afghanistan, NATO Forward Command... Breaker sees his chance and gingerly steps up to Duke and starts sweeping a scanner across the case. Hawk smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was my last job. (a twinkle in his eye) I'm in a whole new outfit now. Duke swivels his gun to Breaker's head. Breaker flinches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just need to deactivate its tracking beacon, for security.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hand over the weapons case son, and let us deliver the warheads.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No way. I signed for 'em. My mission, my package. I carry them, I deliver them. Breaker's scanner BEEPS. He keys a button. The BEEPING promptly stops. He throws a look at Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wasn't hard, was it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine. But you seem to be a little short on transportation a the moment. Team Alpha will deliver you to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And where exactly are you, General?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hawk stands in front of a HOLO-CAM amongst a sea of computers, Cover Girl behind him, Duke on a monitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come see for yourself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Howler skims over the GIANT PYRAMIDS OF GIZA, a caravan of camels below. The aircraft continues out into the golden desert, too fast for anybody to get a good look at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scarlett is cleaning Ripcord's head wound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, you're cute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's going into shock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your name, darlin'?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Snake-Eyes stabs Ripcord hard int he arm with a drip-needle, Rip angrily eyeballs him and stifles a scream.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought all the Special Ops guys were tough.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are tough ... . but also sensitive. (feeling the drugs) Whoa, that's some mucho primo stuff you gave me. Rip is high now, his eyes float up to Heavy Duty who stares back at him. Rip reaches out to touch his well-cropped hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .and a kung-fu grip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The name's Heavy Duty. Duke has the weapons case on his lap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind of outfit is this? Not regular Army based on the accents. (to Scarlett) I have you as an Aussie... (looks to Heavy Duty) And you're a Johannesburger... (then Breaker) And you: French North Africa. Algiers?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tunisia. Where were you born?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you kidding me? Duke wasn't born, he was Government-Issued!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But somehow you're all in the same unit. One you can't tell me the name of right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'd get tossed for telling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke, Duke, don't you get it: they're super secret, they're Mission Impossible. This tape's gonna self-destruct in five--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --You're gonna go after them aren't you? The ones that hit my convoy. (SILENCE) Then whoever you are, whatever this unit is, I want in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not our call. Ripcord sits up, really woozy, looks at Scarlett.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want in too. That way we can spend some bunker time together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: suddenly slices across Rip's face, an inch away. It's Snake-Eyes, checking his blade, seemingly innocent. But the message is not lost on Ripcord. Scarlett looks at Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You two a team or something?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've been together forever. (off her look) But not like that. Hi, I'm Ripcord.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do they call you that? Breaker laughs, reading Ripcord's file:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because his name is Wallace Weems!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eight SECURITY TECHNICIANS sit around an island console in a small, windowless room. Working their keyboards and watching the HOLOGRAPHIC IMAGE of the Howler soaring across the dunes. A technician hits a LARGE SWITCH on his console.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #1 Alpha-One, this is Base. You are cleared or entry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And a huge sand dune directly in front of Howler spirals open to reveal a CAVERNOUS HOLE. The Howler's THRUSTERS twist vertical and it drops like a helicopter into the hole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Global Integrated Joint Operating Entity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Howler descends beneath the surface onto a dark platform as the roof spirals shut and FLOOD LIGHTS switch on. The door of the howler opens and the team steps out. Duke and Ripcord follow hesitantly with the weapons case. A VOICE calls out to them from the shadows:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Welcome to the new Pit! Duke and Ripcord turn to see hawk and Cover girl walking out from behind the lights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: General.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've read a lot about you two.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, look, I didn't "steal" that Blackhawk, I was borrowing it... Duke shoots him a look. Hawk steps right up to Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matter of fact, I saw that one of my subordinates tried to recruit you to our little operation a while back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was never asked to join any Op group.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember a tall gentleman approaching you in Thailand when you were on leave, four years ago?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vaguely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right before you tore up the bar?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Four years? My man had some issues. Duke shoots him another look, then turns back to Hawk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This doesn't look like any Tac Op I've ever seen. Where are we?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, you trusted me by going with my team, so I'll trust you. There's a loud METALLIC CLANG and part of the PLATFORM begins to descend. They pass the URBAN COMBAT LEVEL where MEN and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: are training with next-gen urban warfare equipment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Technically, GI JOE doesn't exist. But if it did, it'd be comprised of the top men and women from the best military units all over the world. The alpha dogs... They see a pretty woman sip into a next-gen CAMO-SUIT, which reflects and refracts light, making her nearly invisible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh man, I want one of those.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The suit or the girl?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Both. Scarlett's eyes roll. They descend into the DESERT COMBAT level, where soldiers train with desert warfare equipment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ten nations signed on in their first year. Working together, sharing intel. Now we have twenty- three.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've never seen combat gear this sleek, what's the trick?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liquid armor. They reach the DEEP SEA COMBAT LEVEL where dozens of men and women are testing fantastic next-gen UNDERWATER VEHICLES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Good news is we've been pretty successful so far. The bad news is whenever we manage to shut down one organization, another springs up in its place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who could possibly fund all this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oprah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hawk now leads the group into the Control Room where more
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: man consoles. Duke still has the weapons case.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #1 Mr. McCullen's standing by, Sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Patch him through, please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So who hit us out there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Currently unidentified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And how'd that bitch in leather get a jump jet like ours?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoever she is, she's clearly well- financed, with access to highly classified intel and state of the art weaponry. Their capabilities are beyond anything we've ever encountered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's the reason we got our asses kicked. Duke betrays nothing. Hawk looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're going to need to find out everything we can about her. Knowing is half the battle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the other half? McCullen now appears next to Ripcord and walks through him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus! And we realize McCullen is here courtesy of a HOLO-PROJECTOR. A ring of cameras provides him with images of the Joes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gentlemen, this is James McCullen,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: of MARS Industries, the man who built these warheads.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: THIS SCENE WITH McCullen standing in front of a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in a small room somewhere. THE HOLOGRAPHIC IMAGES of hawk, Duke, and the others around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: General, most men I've encountered in this business over-promise and under-deliver. You're the opposite. Clearly, you were the security option I should have chosen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Steaming behind his military demeanor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My team did everything we could out there. A lot of good men went down--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --But not you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That mission was classified, sir. Clearly, somebody sold us out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've spent ten years and thirteen billion Euros creating these four warheads. Your job, Captain, was to protect them, and if it wasn't for General Hawk, you would've failed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's not a fair assessment. He followed his orders to the letter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well that wasn't enough. Duke bristles. McCullen turns to Hawk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are your coordinates? I'll have NATO send another special ops team to retrieve the warheads, company strength this time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Apologizes, Mr McCullen. It's not that I don't trust you...I don't trust anybody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you sure you're not a McCullen?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't talk smooth enough to be a McCullen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You do just fine, General. Now, so the bastards who attacked you can't find you, you need to disable the tracking beacon hidden in the case.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We already have.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good man. So, can I count on you to deliver the warheads to NATO now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think it unwise to expose them at the moment. This group might make another attempt. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We need to find and neutralize them before we can consider moving your weapons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright. But allow me to check the warheads to see if any have been damaged. Duke begrudgingly sets the case down. Breaker turns on his suit's BALL-EYEPIECE. It goes into X-RAY MODE and we see the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: crawling around inside the four warheads.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open it, please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My scan says they're intact...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: General?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the code?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: listening carefully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five-two-nine-four-four-oh. Breaker enters the code. As the case opens, Breaker discreetly watches McCullen in his BALL-EYEPIECE SCANNER. McCullen runs his holographic fingers over the warheads. Satisfied, he turns to Hawk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please keep me informed of your progress, General. Duke and McCullen share a quick glare. And then McCullen cuts the feed. Scarlett notices concern on Breaker's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Breaker?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That bloke's Beta waves were going up, down, and sideways... I think he's hiding something. And off the faces of the rest of the group WE CUT BACK TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McCullen turns as Ana appears on a HOLO-PROJECTOR behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I spend five years setting this up. Wringing money out of NATO. This was supposed to be the easy part.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you'd let me stage the assault at your precious factory, we could have contained the situation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And lost the trust of our clients in the process? It had to be NATO's fault. (steps closer) What happened? Did you hesitate?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're implying this was about some ancient history? That's as laughable as your Intel. What went wrong was the Joes appearing out of nowhere. He stares at her suspiciously, then softens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forgive me, jealousy isn't my strong suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget that, where are we now? Have you tracked the case?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They deactivated the beacon. I gave them a code to quietly re-arm it. McCullen hits a key, a SCREEN switches on, displaying A MAP OF THE WORLD. A BEACON LIGHT flashes over a spot in the Egyptian desert, grip coordinates blinking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There it is. The infamous Pit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will get those warheads back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . McCullen steps forward and lovingly caresses her face, his hand going right through her. McCullen whispers menacingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (diffusing the threat) If I were really there, I might actually let you touch me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sly smile) I'll send a jet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Business first. Besides, I'm married, remember? Her holo-form blinks off, leaving McCullen alone in the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sometimes I really hate technology. He sighs heavily, then hears a VOICE:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) It is most often used by those without honor. McCullen turns to see STORM SHADOW, a well-tailored Korean man whose soul has long since departed, standing on the other side of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There can't be any more mistakes. The schedule can't be compromised any further.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you had sent me, it would be done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (walking towards him) I'm sending you now, Storm Shadow. To the Baroness's villa. .Make sure her commitment doesn't waiver. Storm Shadow nods, McCullen continues on THROUGH him. We now realize Storm Shadow was a holo-proj. Storm Shadow vanishes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . McCullen steps up to a large oval perspex window. WE PULL BACK out of the window to reveal that he's riding through
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: inside a next-gen "TRIDENT" submarine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to show the Trident approaching the docking bay of a MASSIVE FACILITY built into the seabed under the jagged canopy of the POLAR ICE CAP. The place is defended by several HARPOON CANNONS and a fearsome TURBO-LASER. It's a breath-taking sight, but also a little frightening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The MARS LOGO is stamped on a pair of WATER-TIGHT DOORS. The logo pulls apart as the doors open, allowing McCullen inside the docking back entrance. Waiting for him is a man known only as THE DOCTOR. His face hidden by a life-support mask that continually pumps air into his lungs and also mechanically helps him to speak without the vocal chords he is missing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good to be back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: we've been very busy. He gestures to TWENTY MERCENARIES or various ethnicities, all standing at attention, not a single muscle moving among them. These are NEO-VIPERS. The baddest of the bad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it working?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You tell me. The Doctor beckons a waiting LAB ASSISTANT who rolls out a glass case containing an eighteen foot long KING COBRA. the Doctor bends down and gazes at the snake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The King Cobra is a magnificent creature. Its venom can kill a full grown elephant with a single bite. He rattles the case and the cobra HISSES at him, revealing its hood. The Doctor steps up to a Neo-Viper and shows McCullen an INCISION SCAR behind the Neo-Vipers' right ears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We introduced into each subject one thousand cc's of the nano-mite solution. As expected, subjects became extremely ill and fell into a coma-like state for approximately forty hours. The Doctor produces a small HANDHELD DEVICE from his pocket,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: of a Neo-Viper appears on the device's screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When they returned to sentience, brain scans showed complete inactivity in the self-preservation region of the cortex.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: English, Doctor. The Doctor keys a demand and that particular Neo-Viper steps up and sticks his bare arm into the case through a portal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They feel no fear. The Neo-Viper grabs the cobra and squeezes, the cobra bites his arm, latching on, sinking its venom into his veins. The Neo-Viper doesn't even wince.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cortical nerve clusters revealed complete inactivity--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --Doctor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They feel no pain. The Doctor keys another command and the Neo-Viper obediently lets go of the cobra and removes his arm from the case.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frontal lobe concepts of morality are disengaged... No remorse...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And they are completely obedient?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. .The real world applications are endless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Neo-Viper's knees give out. McCullen watches curiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the NEO-VIPER'S BITE WOUND where the WHITE VENOM is racing through a blinding labyrinth of veins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) (CONT'D) The nano-mites will target the venom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: we see hundreds of MICROSCOPIC NON-MITES rushing to meet the venom head on. Blocking it. Then swiftly pushing it back. All the way to the original fang holes. The venom seeps out of the holes and drips off the Neo-Viper's arm. He stands and returns to his place in line without a word. The Doctor looks at impressed McCullen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you tell me: is it working?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Doctor follows McCullen through various corridors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The science is staggering isn't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've done well. You've thrown the caber clear out of the yard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But research and science are expensive propositions. If I can make a suggestion..? McCullen stops and looks at him, there is something truly menacing and evil behind this Doctor's mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selling one batch of warheads on the black market could fund--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: appreciate your thirst for knowledge, Doctor. But this world is messy enough. Factions fighting and scrabbling for control, for resources, and it's only going to get worse as the century progresses. No. What the world needs is unification. Leadership. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It needs to be taken out of chaos by someone with complete control. He looks through a portal into a shadowy OPERATING CHAMBER, where a brilliant but vicious looking MAN is being scanned by
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . This is ZARTAN. A Smart Robot begins to change Zartan's fingerprints, which we see on a monitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My family was once this close to that kind of power... (LAUGHS) The French... Zartan CRACKS HIS KNUCKLES and gives McCullen a nod. McCullen looks back at the Doctor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Once I get my hands on the reins, the money will take care of itself. You'll be able to do all the research you want. McCullen strides off. The Doctor stares after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke, still holding the briefcase, stares at a PHOTO OF ANA from the ambush, now up on a monitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We grabbed an image from Heavy- Duty's helmet cam. Ripcord looks stunned, he leans closer to Duke and whispers:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, that's-- Duke cuts him off with a look. Breaker extracts a full 3D FRONT-VIEW of Ana's face from the photo. Then on an adjacent monitor, he runs an endless series of PHOTOS OF WOMEN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now we can run the face through an infinity scan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have access to any photograph on any server anywhere in the world.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone gets photographed in some way at some time. ATM machines, airports, crowd shots at a football game. We'll find her. Duke just stares at Ana's photo. Ripcord whispers quietly:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (not okay) .what happened to her? For once, Ripcord doesn't know what to say. Cover Girl walks in and hands a document to Hawk, who looks through it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From NATO. I am now the official custodian of the warheads. Your mission is complete. Once you hand it over, that is. Duke nods, hands over the case with a hint of defeat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you move it, she's gonna come after you, you know that, right? (off Hawk's look) And with her Intel, and her toys... she'll find you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And your point is...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going to go after her first. And I want to help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let us in on this, General. Our team just got wasted. I think a little payback is in order.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't ask to be a part of GI JOE. You get asked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You scouted me four years ago, now I'm ready. Let's have at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've lost men too, Captain. Good men. But attempting to--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You said knowing is half the battle. Well, I know who she is. Duke reaches into his pocket, pulls out a photo and shows Hawk. INSERT PHOTO: Ana, four years earlier, much softer looking, staring lovingly at Duke as they're about to kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Her name is Ana Lewis, and I can tell you everything you need to know about her until... four years ago. After that, well, obviously sa lot's changed. Hawk just stares in disbelief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hawk sits down behind his desk and looks up at Duke, still standing at attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Before this goes any further, I need to know what I'm dealing with, a man looking to settle a score, or a man who can put the mission first. Because the battlefield is the wrong place for emotion. (he pauses for effect) Could you kill her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I had to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chances are you will. But if you flinch, hesitate even an instant... what I'm trying to say is, unless you can kill her graveyard dead I don't want you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can. (off Hawk's look) I signed on to deliver those warheads, General, and despite your present authority, I want to finish the job. Hawk regards him for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So tell me about her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, I'll start right here: I hope that vault is tight, because she always gets what she wants...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: drives towards a magnificent mansion in the Parisian suburbs. Though the vehicle looks relatively harmless, we'll come to know it as a "SCARAB" attack truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : PARIS, FRANCE INT. FOYER - THE BARONESS' MANSION - PARIS - NIGHT Ana enters the mansion. SERVANTS take her coat as her handsome, sophisticated and well dressed husband, BARON LEON DECOBRAY, glides up to her, very French. They kiss warmly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, darling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How is work at the lab?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steady progress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So the Minister of Defense was pleased?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was. You know I wish I could tell you more...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were gone a long time. How were the shops in Monte Carlo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't get what I was after. They head up the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I suppose I should be grateful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Most husbands would be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Most husbands don't have such mysterious wives, they know exactly where they are and what they do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They think they know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana throws open the double doors to her grand bedroom on a high floor with a view of the Eiffel Tower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I never get over how beautiful...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (staring at Ana) Neither do I. She spots Storm Shadow standing in an ante room and quickly spins to face her husband. She pulls Decobray close and kisses him. Storm Shadow makes a move, but ana warns him off with her eyes, She finishes the kiss and looks at Decobray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me change and freshen up and I'll meet you for dinner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. Decobray smiles at her and leaves. The smile falls from Ana's face as she spins around and heads for Storm Shadow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. McCullen gave me explicit orders to sever the Baron's spine if he so much as touched you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's my husband, of course he touches me. Tell McCullen to grow up. Besides, the Baron says his work in the lab goes much better after we've... touched. And that's the important thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be accompanying you to retrieve the warheads this time. Along with some of the men the Doctor's been working on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (with distaste) The Doctor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We go at dawn. Storm Shadow turns and heads out through the doors. Ana Stands alone in her room now, she heads over to her dresser and opens a hidden drawer. Inside is a SMALL BOX. She opens it carefully and gazes at an ENGAGEMENT RING inside. Something sad and lonely in her eyes... And WE FLASHBACK TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .C. - NIGHT A crowded military club. OFFICERS and ENLISTED dancing to an orchestra. And there's Ana, the most beautiful woman in the room. Wearing a black dress. Slightly younger and with none of the cold viciousness she displayed earlier. She's dancing with Duke who's wearing his officer's DRESS UNIFORM, replete with bars and medals. She laughs as Duke whispers something in her ear. She's in love. And so is he. Ripcord is in a booth, downing shots with four ENLISTED WOMEN. He has his arms around two of them and looks loaded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My hot tub only holds four. (COUNTS) No, five.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke leads Ana outside onto a quiet verandah, the lights of Washington shimmering beyond them. He suddenly kneels down in front of her, an ENGAGEMENT RING in a box in his hand. Ana gasps with shock and joy, tears welling in her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've been wanting to do this before we deploy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke...it's beautiful. It's too nice you lunatic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only time I'm buying one of these, so why not? They stare a each other, a touching beat. Then Duke screws up his face, worried?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, what do you say? She's too emotional to speak. And then they hear:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Say yes, you idiot...! Lieutenant REX LEWIS saunters up, MEDICAL INSIGNIA on his collar. The look on his face tells us he's happy for them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .Before I tell my new brother-in- law what it's like to share a bathroom with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks for killing the mood, Rex.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was coming to offer you a ride back to post.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Time already?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We go at oh-five hundred.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it WMDs? It is, right? That's why you're pulling Rex out of the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana, we can't--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, yeah. Classified. Top Secret. Have to kill me if you told me, blah, blah, blah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Speaking of classified information, you still haven't answered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Of course it's yes. On one
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She grabs REX and pulls him down on his knees next to Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Promise me that you won't let my genius egghead brother get hurt. (looks at Rex) He's the only family I've got left. (back to Duke) Promise me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I promise. She smiles and holds out her hand. He threads the ring onto her trembling finger. Rex smiles, but in his eyes is a glint of instability. Ripcord comes CRASHING OUT through shuttered doors and sprawls out next to them, arms and legs akimbo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus, Rip. Ripcord rolls over and yells back through the doors:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How was I supposed know she was married!? (then, notices the ring) Nice rock! Hey, are you proposing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm done proposing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I already said yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not official until you answer my question. Do you love my boy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Always and forever. Ripcord flips open his CELL PHONE and takes the photo of Ana that Duke carries with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now I've gotta find someone to love me, as many times as possible for the next three hours.
direction.name: direction

result.ToD: SMASH CUT BACK TO THE PRESENT
result.heading: SMASH CUT BACK TO THE PRESENT

direction.raw_text: then SMASH CUT BACK TO THE PRESENT.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: WE PUSH IN ON THE PHOTO,

direction.raw_text: On Duke, watching Heavy Duty pulling out an ACCELERATOR SUIT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you want to join us, you'll need to be mission ready, Joe style. This is the Mark One Accelerator Suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's it accelerate?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You. It'll make you run faster, jump higher, and hit harder than any of your enemies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: slides over a shoe. COBALT MACHINE PARTS snap into place with a HISS over Duke and Rip's arms and legs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Head-to-toe turbo-hydraulics and highly-pressurized pneumatics. They both slap on aerodynamic, flying-wing HELMETS. Inside, the CYBERNETIC POWER-UP with an ear piercing whine. LASER ENHANCED LED readouts scramble and fritz across their HUDs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An advanced cybernetics heads-up display, feeding into your helmet. Duke checks out two gas-propelled GRAPPLING SPEARS and six
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: around his right forearm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two gas propelled grappling spears and six ten millimeter, hi- explosive, heat seeking, fire-and- forget rockers. Rip spins the twin barrels of a caseless SUBMACHINE GUN on his left forearm. A Cheshire grin spreads across his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And a nine millimeter, caseless submachine gun with six hundred rounds capable of firing all of them in thirty seconds. Duke and Ripcord are now buckled in, getting a feel for the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Ripcord glances at Heavy Duty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just missed everything you said. (turns to Duke) How do I look? Pretty cool, huh?
direction.name: direction

result.heading: URBAN ENVIRONMENT OBSTACLE COURSE, 3D HOLO-PROJECTION TERRORISTS

direction.raw_text: Duke and Ripcord run through and URBAN ENVIRONMENT OBSTACLE COURSE, 3D HOLO-PROJECTION TERRORISTS lunging out at them. The guys take them out one by one, never more than a split second after they appear. The HOLO-PROJECTIONS fritz and die. They reach the end of the and a BUZZER SOUNDS. At the back, arms crossed, impassively taking it all in, is Hawk. Scarlett approaches the guys with an ELECTRONIC CLIPBOARD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sixty-three seconds. Not Bad. But not good enough. Gotta get under a minute to qualify.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the record?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forty-five.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't tell me, Snake-Eyes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, me. Ripcord glances at Scarlett's CROSSBOW PISTOL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can do this whole course with that thing in forty-five seconds?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're going to shoot at something, kill it. Otherwise take up knitting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I want something, I don't just shoot at it... (steps close to her) When I get a target in my sights, I take it down. His meaning is clear. She holds his gaze, slaps a magazine into her CROSSBOW PISTOL and hands it to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here. Go on. Try it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't want to show you up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, that's so thoughtful of you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What can I tell you? I guess I'm just a considerate, humble guy. You'll learn that about me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm the "target in your sights," right? You've got ten rounds to "take me down".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to hurt you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're training arrows. The most I'll feel is a little jolt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Scarlett walks back and faces him. He glances aside at Duke who is loving this. Ripcord readies the pistol. Scarlett darts left. He shoots and misses. She darts right. He misses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, Rip. Ripcord tries harder, genuinely doing his best. But Scarlett us too fast. Ducking and weaving around Ripcord, as nimble as a cat. Five more shots miss her. And now Ripcord's feeling the pressure. He waits for her to move. Fires. She leaps up onto a corner wall and the bolt passes underneath. He fires again as she lands, ducks under it and rolls up to him. He fires his last bolt point blank. She catches it in her left hand by the stem as it leaves the chamber. Slamming her body up against his. Right hand behind his head, left hand holding the bolt. Their faces close. Lips closer. Ripcord's eyes on hers as he whispers:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guess you didn't really want me that bad, rip. She holds his eyes a moment longer, then lets him go. As she walks away, Scarlett casually tosses the ARROW, it hits the ground and EXPLODES. Ripcord and Duke jump back. Ripcord glances at the underside of the pistol's magazine. Three words: "CAUTION: LIVE BOLTS". Both men watch Scarlett saunter back to the beginning of the course, awestruck. Breaker walks by eating a burrito and watching his bio-rhythm display.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aw, Ripcord's heart just skipped a beat. Isn't that sweet?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The sun is sinking, turning the dunes a brilliant orange.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Security works a console in the Security Room. Their infrared monitors show a HERDSMAN AND HIS CAMELS walking across the desert dunes. A Technician taps some keys and an
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: shows the skeletal structures of the herdsman and his camels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The HERDSMAN walks across the desert with his CAMELS under a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and a field of glittering stars. All of a sudden,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: whip past his feet, almost knocking him over. He stares at them as they abruptly disappear deeper under the sand, like diving submarines.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana drives the lead MOLE POD, an oblong-shaped digging device that is just large enough for her to fit inside. She watches her HUD relay information about her angle of decent and her distance to the target. Thirty yards...twenty yards...ten...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A light flashes on the console in the security room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #1 Sensors detecting seismic activity to the southwest. Probably just a tremor, but have a team check it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ripcord and the other Joes watch as Duke and Snake-Eyes circle one another with special ELECTRIFIED PUGIL STICKS. Duke thrusts with a standard bayonet style move, Snake-Eyes side steps it, spins his pugil stick above his head and brings it down on Duke's head with a sword-like stroke. A CRACKLING SHOCK is delivered and Duke goes down. The Joes grimace, feeling Duke's pain. Snake-Eyes turns away, done with him. Duke pops back up again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Again. They go at each other, fast and furious, the electrified pugil sticks crackling and sparking. Duke spins and attempts a stroke similar to Snake-Eyes' earlier move. Snake-Eyes blocks it, drops, and sweeps Duke's feet, taking him down hard before finishing him with another SPARKING HIT. Again, the Joes react. Snake-Eyes turns away. Duke shakes it off and pops to his feet once more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Snake-Eyes nods, a little more respect in his eyes now. This time after the high blows are parried, Snake-Eyes tries the sweep. Duke jumps it, rolls, comes up behind Snake-Eyes and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Snake-Eyes barely blocks it. They trade half a dozen blows, the electricity popping and crackling before Snake-Eyes tries a finishing blow. Duke stuffs it with his stick and tackles Snake-Eyes. They fall to the ground, both receiving JOLTS. They go eye-to-eye. It wasn't pretty, but Duke is getting effective. Snake-Eyes pops to his feet. This time he offers a hand to pull Duke up. Across the room, Hawk watches with approval.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The huge drill bit of Ana's mole machine bursts out of the reinforced clay wall, it opens and retracts, Ana rolls out and drops to the ground. Another huge drill bursts out, it retracts and opens and Storm Shadow drops to the ground. They look around. They're between the clay wall and the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: of the Pit's generator station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The foundation of this fence is a hundred feet deep. No going under. Ten Neo-Viper mole pods start to burst out the wall. And then there's a crashing sound as one of the wall girders bends, obviously a mole machine in the clay behind it hit it. Ana can hear the engine grind to a halt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we don't get him out he'll suffocate. Storm Shadow gives her a look: Like I care?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just thought I'd mention it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All that matters is the mission. Ana pulls out a hi-tech SCANNING DEVICE which shoots out six
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in a 360 DEGREE ARC, creating a DETAILED SCHEMATIC of the Pit, showing rooms and people moving about them. She points down a tunnel beyond the electrified fence. Storm Shadow gestures to one of the Neo-Vipers. The Man immediately walks over and grabs the fence, electricity JOLTS him violently, but the man ignores it and shakily starts climbing the fence. The skin on his hands and arms starts to burn and bubble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Acceptable collateral damage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (trying to out-tough him) Is there any other? Near the top the Man finally falls backward and drops down dead. Storm Shadow nods to the next Viper. Without hesitation the Man walks over and grabs the fence. He is immediately JOLTED, but keeps climbing, burning and bubbling. This guy makes it to the top, throws himself over, and crashes to the ground, then crawls over and pulls the OFF SWITCH, cutting the electricity before dropping dead himself. Ana, Storm Shadow and the others quickly scale the fence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An area where the Joe team chills. Duke and Ripcord enter, sore and worked over. They move to some couches. Heavy Duty grooves to the blasting Reggaeton classic "Salio El Sol".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can learn a whole hell of a lot about a girl by the way she dances. Tell me I'm wrong Snake-Eyes. Snake-Eyes, sharpening his sword, barely looks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See? He agrees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, he doesn't. Do you? This time Snake-eyes looks up, his expression unreadable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See, he knows you have to listen to get to know someone. Right, Rip? Rip is happily stowing his liquid armor gear, glances over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? You say something? Breaker sits at a chessboard. Heavy D sits across from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, Scarlett, gotta go with Heavy D on this one. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like my man says, get a girl on the floor, you don't just see how she moves, you get the smell of her. What biologists tell us is that the decision is made by he nose long before the rest of the body gets involved. It's a question of pheromones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going to teach me science? I read all about the positron emission tomography studies concerning sex pheromones when I was twelve. I'm just saying, it's not very romantic. Rip whispers to Duke, nodding towards Scarlett.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heavy told me she graduated college at twelve. No response from Duke, who is trying to get comfortable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's like a freaky genius. A deadly, freaky genius.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You like her, I get it already.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (making a chess move) You can't learn this stuff in a book, Scarlett. You have to at least kiss a guy, before you're an expert on romance. The guys all laugh. Scarlett blushes, then raises her bow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who am I shooting first? The laughter stops. Rip looks surprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You haven't kissed anyone? Now Scarlett looks really furious. Rip instantly wishes he could take his words back. Duke just shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really firing on all cylinders there, Rip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All I know is, when the bass get's that booty shaking in the right way, I'm in the skin like a man named Flynn. Heavy Duty does a little freak dance. Scarlett makes a show of disgust. Ripcord watches Scarlett, then makes a decision.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hell with it. He strides across the room toward Scarlett. Breaker notices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to no one in particular) Into the Valley of Death rode the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Heavy Duty looks at him, confused. Breaker nods to Ripcord, stopping near Scarlett's chair. Ripcord sees Snake-Eyes taking in his every move. Scarlett now has her nose in a book. Ripcord CLEARS HIS THROAT but she doesn't look up. He peers closer and WE SEE THE COVER, on which, though in English, is a damn near INDECIPHERABLE SCIENTIFIC TITLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beach reading, huh? She groans and lowers the book only slightly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, I guess we kinda got off on the wrong foot... Without changing expression she goes back to her book.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay look, I'm attracted to you. And you, you're attracted to me. And him-- (nods towards Snake-Eyes) The Zen Master, he creeps me out, but what I'm saying is--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "We're attracted to one another."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what you're saying, not what I'm saying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, what are you saying?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Attraction is an emotion. Emotions are not based in science. And if you can't quantify or prove that something exists, well, in my mind... it doesn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, I'll get back to you on that. And he walks away scratching his head. Hawk steps in. Everyone comes to attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke, You scored in the top half- percent of all people we've ever tested. Rip, well, if we average your scores with Duke's, you pass too. Welcome aboard, provisionally. But we still need to see if you pass muster in the field. Hawk gives them a nod. Duke and rip nod back with pride.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Welcome aboard, boyz!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana, Storm Shadow and the Neo-Vipers creep down the hallway. Two GI JOE GUARDS come around a corner, before they can even react, Storm Shadow practically cuts them in two with his Katana sword. Ana Directs them down another hallway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: reads, "General Hawk". Cover Girl walks up and knocks. As she waits, we see a SHADOW moving behind her. Hawk opens the door. She hands him her POWERBOOK and a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry to disturb you, general.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's all right, Cover Girl. What am I signing now? Cover Girl GASPS, a KATANA BLADE piercing out through her chest. She drops lifelessly, revealing Storm Shadow behind her. Hawk grabs a PISTOL, but Storm Shadow flashes his two swords. One slices the barrel of the pistol clean off, the other buries itself in Hawk's gut. Hawk collapses. Ana steps forward and rips the General's SECURITY BADGE off his jacket. Hawk's eyes follow them as they leave. He glances at a RED BUTTON under his desk and struggles to reach it, giving everything he's got, until he finally hits the button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Duke, Ripcord and all the Joes leap up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The warheads. They all rush out of the doors. Breaker stops to change a chess piece on the board before racing out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana swipes Hawk's SECURITY BADGE across the lock of the VAULT DOOR. It opens. The weapons case sits on a table. She opens the case to check that the four warheads are inside, they shine on her glasses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke and Ripcord reach the main vault, armed only with their pistols. They find the INNER VAULT DOOR ajar. They approach, pushing back the door to discover that the place is empty and the weapons case is gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They can't be far.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some of the Neo-Vipers now reach the MOLE PODS and begin prepping them for escape. BOOM! A GRENADE slams into them, killing them and destroying the pods. It's Heavy Duty with his "MPL". Ana enters the room and quick-draws her PULSE PISTOL and blasts away. Heavy Duty dives behind cover, which is blown away, knocking him out cold. Storm Shadow examines the ruined MOLE PODS, glancing around, his eyes falling on a pair of "ARCLIGHT" JET PACKS mounted on a wall rack nearby. Storm Shadow strides to the nearest one and puts it on. Ana heads after him, still carrying the case. Suddenly, Duke and Ripcord rush up behind them, guns raised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put the case down, Ana, Rip trains his gun on Storm Shadow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you get out of that...thing. Stalemate. Storm Shadow doesn't move. Ana turns and looks at Duke. Sets the case down, her voice is gentle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine. Done. Then she takes a step toward Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop, Ana. Stop right there. But she doesn't. She just keeps slowly moving toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't shoot me, can you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will if I have to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deep down, you're still the same man I fell in love with.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't force this, Ana.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What could have been, right, Duke? You beside your best man. Me walking down the aisle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't listen to her, Duke. (a thought) Was I really going to be your best man?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cocking the pistol) Don't make me do this god-damnit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Don't make me do this?" A recurring theme in your life, right Duke? She takes another step. Duke levels his pistol right at her forehead. Storm Shadow flinches. Duke gives him a glance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move and I'll blow her away. (to Ripcord) Get the briefcase. Ana takes another step forward, daring Duke to pull the trigger. Ripcord, gun drawn and fixed on Storm Shadow, moves slowly forward to retrieve the briefcase. Ana is now an inch from the extended barrel. Ana and Duke are close enough to feel each other's breath. Their eyes lock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do it, Duke. .You already killed me once. And in Duke's eyes we see him falter, just a bit. Ripcord passes Ana, and wit hone lightning quick hand she slaps at Duke's pistol. AN ERRANT SHOT GOES OFF. Storm Shadow lunges at ripcord, SLICING his pistol in half with one sword and about to kill him with the other. When suddenly, Snake-Eyes lunges INTO FRAME. CLANG! Snake- Eyes' KATANA BLADE saves Ripcord's life by a half inch. The rest of the Neo-Vipers arrive and immediately open fire, pinning both Duke and Ripcord down. All hell breaks loose. Snake-Eyes and Storm Shadow lunge at one another, swords flashing at impossible speeds, then they lock swords. Face- to-face, staring hard into each other's eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Snake-Eyes glances at Storm Shadow's right forearm, spotting the same RED MARKINGS of his ninja clan underneath his suit sleeve. This shocks the hell out of Snake-Eyes. Storm Shadow smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello brother. Snake-Eyes looks shocked. Storm Shadow uses the moment to elbow him in the face, knocking him hard to the ground. Ana grabs the weapons case as Scarlett rushes in, aiming her
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I believe you've got my luggage. Ana stares at Scarlett, then quick-draws a PULSE PISTOL. Her shot tears the CROSSBOW PISTOL out of Scarlett's hands. Ana's got her dead-to-rights until Scarlett triggers her CAMO- SUIT, melting into nothing right in front of Ana. Ana doesn't spot the RIPPLES OF AIR around her until she's stuck hard. The case goes flying. Another SMACK and her pistol is knocked free. Ana grabs a second pistol, but that's just as quickly twisted out of her grasp and dropped. Ana fights the invisible Scarlett as best she can, but Scarlett lands several unseen blows on her. Ripcord and Duke take out a pair of Neo-Vipers. Storm Shadow climbs back into the Arclight. Looking at ana as she falls near a vehicle on the blocks. Ana grabs an OIL PAN and flings the oil, which sprays over everything, including Scarlett, making her visible. Ana leaps on Scarlett, knocks her to the ground and angrily begins to choke the life out of her. Storm Shadow ignites the Arclight which jumps into the air, powered by an arc of blue light shooting out of its engine pack. He quickly swoops towards the two women and grabs ana by her arm, pulling her along. Ana grabs the weapons case and they soar up out of the motor pool and over the landing pad. The battle raging below them. Ripcord and Duke fire after them, but they vanish up into the next level. Heavy Duty, now back in action, takes out the last of the Neo-Vipers. Snake-Eyes checks on Scarlett who's nursing her neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana climbs to Storm Shadow as the rocket up to the SECURITY ROOM WINDOW and BLAST it out of their way. SHATTER CITY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They fly into the security room and quickly dispatch the few technicians still alive. Ana his the large switch on the console and the huge door begins to spiral open. She jumps back into Storm Shadow's arms and they blast back out--
direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

The Doctor grins proudly. McCullen looks disturbed.

location: NIGHT A TEN YEAR OLD FRENCH ORPHAN BOY,

direction.raw_text: : Young Snake Eyes sneaks in through the Kitchen window and goes to a rice pot on the counter. As he takes a first bite, another young boy enters, we see the RED CLAN MARKINGS on his forearm, it's a young Storm Shadow, healthy, wealthy, and well fed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thief ! He picks up the KITCHEN KNIFE and tries to cut Young Snake- Eyes, who blocks the strike with the rice pot. They fight fiercely for two little kids, using all sorts of utensils and furniture. Snake-Eyes has desperate street skills, but Storm Shadow's classic training gives him the edge. He finally traps Snake-Eyes under his foot, a triumphant look on his face. He starts to choke Snake-Eyes with his foot ...

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) (Japanese, subtitled) Enough! Storm Shadow! A Ninja Master steps forward. Storm Shadow turns to him.
