direction.raw_text: Battered and bruised, Scarlett hurriedly enters the barracks. Checks around to see that she's alone. Then she heads for a mirror over one of the sinks, peeling back her collar to check the CHOKE MARKS on her neck. Her hands are trembling. She turns on the water and cleans her face with a WASH CLOTH. Ripcord enters the barracks behind. Like Scarlett, he looks around to see if he's alone. He catches Scarlett looking at him in the mirror, as if he's unwanted. Then he notices the choke marks. He is genuinely concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus, you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not fine, let me look at that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I looked at it, it's fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take it easy, just trying to help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know what you're trying to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what is that exactly?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have time for this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, not every guy you meet is an asshole. You do know that, don't you? Scarlett stops and returns to the sink, he ignores her, cleaning the blood off his face. She softens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not you, I... I didn't really want anyone to... see me in here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. All the people we lost last night. General Hawk... My neck is not that important.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You almost died. You're allowed to be concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First fight I've lost since I was a kid. My father would be... he was my instructor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Think he's be disappointed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He taught me to win.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know how you teach anybody to win at everything every time. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I do know you can teach someone to get up when they get knocked down. Ripcord turn her gently in the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at you. Still here. Maybe this is what he wanted you to learn. Scarlett stares at her reflection briefly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But of course, that would be an emotional response, one that can't be explained or quantified. Ripcord turns and heads for the door. Scarlett watches him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're not a couple. Snake-Eyes and me. We're... close, he's like a brother, but... we're not a couple. Ripcord looks back at her, nods, then walks on out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hawk is hooked up to a LIFE SUPPORT MACHINE. Duke sits nearby, his shoulder being bandaged by a Medical Officer. WE PUSH IN ON Duke's eyes, staring into oblivion, AND FLASHBACK CUT TO: HAWK'S FACE RIGHT AT CAMERA:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you kill her? And then WE FLASHBACK TO: Ana strangling Scarlett, a smile on her face. Squeezing harder, harder. Pure evil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) (PRELAP) That ought to hold you.

direction.raw_text: Duke "comes to" as the Doctor finishes and walks away. Duke takes a breath, looks to Hawk in his bed, then stands and walks over. He stares down at Hawk, then, a promise--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Graveyard dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke, Ripcord, Scarlett, Snake-Eyes, and Heavy Duty stare at some next-gen computerized ultra-sound PHOTOSTATS of a dead Neo-Viper. Snake-Eyes points in question to an area.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nano-mites. I wrote my thesis on the theory behind them at Oxford. They've been surgically implanted behind the ear, all programmed to accomplish different tasks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Theoretically, the possibilities are endless. Increase their speed, agility, resilience. You program, they perform. That's the genius of nanotechnology, it can do pretty much whatever you want it to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mind control?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't see why not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke and Ripcord move with the others through a corridor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Their weaponry, financing, intel, it has to be McCullen. Doing an inside job on his own warheads.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You may be right. Maybe he needed
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to pay for his R D.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The weapons case! Everyone stops and looks at Ripcord like he's nuts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember he had us open the case for him. Remember that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll bet that code he gave us like re-activated the tracking beacon or something. Looks pass among the group, it starts to make sense.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And who says you're not a thinker. All of the sudden, Breaker rushes up to them, out of breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I found her...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, you found her all right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Her name is Ana DeCobray now, Baroness if you're feeling formal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow, she traded up, huh? (off Duke's look) I mean... financially.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Baron DeCobray. Big shot French scientist. Runs a lab in Paris.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lab? Breaker call up an image of DeCobray standing in front of a huge PARTICLE ACCELERATOR along with some other scientists.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Particle accelerator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're gonna use him to weaponize the warheads.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's where she's going.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who likes croissants?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And then a lighted aircraft in the distance approaches at Mach three. It's the Howler.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Joes are silent, eyes ahead. Scarlett shares a smile with Ripcord, next to her, Across from them Duke watches, almost smiles, then lays back his head and closes his eyes. AND WE FLASHBACK TO:

direction.raw_text: S AROUND a village choked by thick jungle as
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: erupt in SLO-MO and a BLACKHAWK circles, ROTORS beating hypnotically, giving the images a dreamlike quality.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BLACKHAWK HELICOPTER, DAWN - FLASHBACK Duke, Ripcord, Rex, and the rest of an insertion team, sit with their backs against the chopper walls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Per the briefing, we fast rope in, form up and assault the main lab... (a glance at Rex) Rex--uh, .the science officer, stays back with Fireteam Alpha until Bravo enters and secures the building. Alpha holds the perimeter while science officer secures the WMDs. Five minutes before extraction and the airstrike. The squad nods. Duke looks to Rex again. Rex is sweating, trying not to show it. Duke hands him a piece of gum.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Double Bubble? Rex takes it. Duke blows a bubble, smiles at Rex.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Always helps me. You good?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (weak smile back) Yeah... They chew their gum.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Duke leads a frontal assault of the main building. They take fire from some GUARDS, but put them down. Other GUARDS flee. The way to the door is cleared. Duke gives hand signals along with his commands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go, Bravo. Bravo, a TWO-MAN fire team hit the door of the building. They disappear inside. Rex, a kit bag over his shoulder and a .45 Colt ACP on his hip, waits in a crouch, Duke next to him puts a hand on his shoulder. Duke scans the treeline for any treats. One of Bravo Team appears in the doorway and signals "ALL CLEAR." Duke double taps Rex on the shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're good to go, Rex. You don't find it in four minutes, get out of there, because that house won't be standing in five. I already called for the air strike. Rex nods. Duke gives him a smile. Rex takes off and runs low to the door, entering the house. Duke watches him go, then looks back to the jungle and hears the WHUMP of mortars. Duke takes one more look, Rex disappears safely inside, then the mortar rounds start to hit. The ground is torn apart, dirt flying in the air, as Duke, Rip and the rest of the squad takes cover. We catch glimpses of the enemy, lots of them, in the jungle, firing. Duke and Ripcord pop up and return fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've gotta level with ya!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hate it when you level with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gonna be a long five minutes. Duke just grits his teeth and keeps firing. Then, in the distance, RUMBLING coming from the sonic roar of JETS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love that sound... But then he looks to Duke, confusion on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, no... It's too soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON: The F-16s in formation streaking toward them across the sky. Duke looks back at the main building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rex. Duke runs for the building. Tracer fire and mortar explosions all around him. Then the whistle of a bunker buster. Duke dives and BOOM! The building is flattened by the bomb. Duke is tossed through the air like a rag doll. Lands hard, barely registers the pain, staggers up, bloody and ripped, stumbles toward the smoking. Flaming rubble that was the building. The Blackhawk comes sweeping low, ready for extraction, the tracer fire and explosions intensify. Black smoke washes over Duke. Ripcord finds him in the debris.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blackhawk's waiting. Come on, we've got wounded! And incoming enemy! Lots of 'em!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing you can do. Come on...! Gunfire bursts around them as Ripcord pulls Duke away from the ruins of the house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke's haunted, soot-streaked face as his eyes take on a thousand-yard stare. AND WE CUT BACK TO THE PRESENT:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke is wide awake, his eyes have on a thousand-yard stare...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Paris by day, the Eiffel Tower in all her glory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana's SCARAB ATTACK TRUCK pulls up to a GUARD SHED outside a large building which is surrounded by an ELECTRIFIED FENCE. A SECURITY GUARD steps out of the shed and taps on the driver's window. The Neo-Viper behind the wheel lowers the BACKSEAT WINDOW, revealing Ana and Storm Shadow in the back. The guard smiles at Ana. They speak in French, subtitled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good Morning. Baroness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning. Gene. My husband's expecting me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absolument. The Security Guard opens the ELECTRONIC GATE and the Scarab drives up to the building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two SECURITY GUARDS look up from their desks as Ana and Storm Shadow stride through the DOORS with two Neo-Vipers. Storm Shadow throws something. Both guards fall dead. THROWING STARS in their heads. The Neo-Vipers steal behind the desk, throw a switch, open a LOCKED DOOR for Ana and Storm Shadow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana and Storm Shadow enter a colossal chamber which is all but consumed by the PARTICLE ACCELERATOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: swarm all over it, taking readings and making adjustments, under the eyes of DeCobray who sits at a control station surrounded by monitors. Ana gives the weapons case to Storm Shadow who hangs back as she walks up to her husband.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need you to do something for me and I don't have much time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sees Storm Shadow) Who is this? She beckons Storm Shadow who sets the weapons case down on DeCobray's desk, opening it up to reveal the four NANOTECH WARHEADS and their launchers. DeCobray stares, bewildered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't understand... what are these things? What's going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're warheads, dear. And I need you to weaponize them for me... (looking around) .or we'll kill everyone in here. DeCobray stares at her, shocked. He looks at Storm Shadow who removes a GLOCK PISTOL from his belt and shoots a TECHNICIAN. Chaos erupts. DeCobray shouts to the room, calming the others somewhat. He stares at Ana and Storm Shadow, terrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a civilian laboratory. We don't have the correct programming protocols for weaponizing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The protocols are in the case. (he hesitates) I told you, I don't have much time. DeCobray reluctantly takes the weapons case.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: charges through the streets. On the outside it looks like your Uncle's R.V, but inside it's all next-gen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heavy Duty drives the Brawler while Breaker mans a hi-tech terminal next to him. In the back, Snake-Eyes loads his guns while Scarlett, Duke, and Ripcord put on ACCELERATOR SUITS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heavy D and Breaker will stay in the Brawler, watch our back. The rest of us will break into the lab with the accelerator suits. Once the warheads are weaponized, they'll be extremely volatile. We can't afford to let any of them go off inside the city. Ripcord looks at Snake-Eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about you? Don't you get a suit? Snake-Eyes just looks at him, "Are you kidding me?"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He doesn't need one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: echoes through the chamber as the particle accelerator come to life, HUMMING evenly. Storm Shadow backs up a little. Ana glances at him. He shrugs, what? Technicians quickly finish up and back away from the accelerator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Firing. DeCobray hits a switch. The PARTICLE ACCELERATOR charges and begins hurling atoms through miles and miles of underground tunnels. Inside the accelerator, the four warheads begin to spin in a GLASS VACUUM CHAMBER -- then, as the power grows, they begin to rise, each one hovering as they spin. Ana and Storm Shadow watch with mild curiosity as the noise inside the chamber builds. The atoms catapulting faster and faster through the tunnels, bombarding the warheads again and again. Until finally, a LOUD BOOM rings out. And the warheads slowly sink back down and stop spinning. DeCobray keys another button and the GLASS VACUUM CHAMBER emerges from the accelerator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Technicians open the chamber and very carefully remove the warheads, returning them to their case. Storm Shadow locks the case and picks it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Careful... they're alive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Leon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I have never seen the face of evil until I looked at you now. Ana looks at him and falters, something in his words piercing her hard veneer. She feels Storm Shadow watching her and with a flick of her eyes, the walls go up again. She drop a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: on DeCobray's desk and heads for the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adieu. DeCobray watches her go, then opens the envelope. We see the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: printed on the first page: "ACCORD DE DIVORCE".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Brawler races up towards the lab, they see it out their forward windows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana and Storm Shadow emerge from the lab and climb into the back of the Scarab as the two Neo-Vipers climb in the front.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DeCobray stumbles out to the foyer, finds the two Security Guards dead, and quickly picks up a phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Security Guard in the guard shed puts down his phone and glances at the oncoming Scarab just as a Neo-Viper leans out with his PULSE RIFLE and blasts the whole shed to pieces. The Scarab crashes right out the gate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At the same time, the Brawler reaches the laboratory and there's a split second where both sides see each other in their windows. Duke and Ana lock eyes. Snake-Eyes and Storm Shadow do the same.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's them! Snake-Eyes is already moving, lunging out a SIDE DOOR onto the street as the Brawler still moves, running right at the Scarab which turns to get away. Scarlett immediately follows him out, landing in a roll with her accelerator suit. Ana leans out of her window and fires her PULSE PISTOLS at the Brawler, keeping Duke and Rip inside. Then she fires at Snake-Eyes and Scarlett. Snake-Eyes dives, but the blasts nail Scarlett. She crashes hard. Snake-Eyes glances at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep going! With that, he leaps after the Scarab, just grabbing the back of the vehicle as it tears away. The Brawler stops right next to Scarlett, out of breath, her accelerator suit
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Duke and Ripcord) Don't worry about me, go and help Snake-Eyes! Duke doesn't need to be told twice. He leaps out and runs after the Scarab. Rips starts to follow, Breaker grabs him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Careful. They're worth millions of dollars... each.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Millions of dollars, got it. He promptly trips and crashes to the pavement. Picks himself up. Gets hit by a car. Picks himself up again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Driver) Sorry! Excusem moil (to a stunned Breaker) Won't happen again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Then Rip hauls-ass after Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An ACCORDIAN BUS passes casually through an intersection. All of a sudden, the Scarab bursts through it, ripping it in two and barrelling on down the busy street. Snake-Eyes is still barely clinging to the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Breaker watches the two halves of the bus whirl around on his
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as Heavy Duty drives through the city streets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Christ, they just shot right through a bus!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke and Rip charge after the Scarab. Their speedometers reading 15mph...then 30mph...then 40mph. they leap over and around speeding cars and trucks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Scarab smashes through any vehicle in its path, leaving a trail of destruction for Duke and Ripcord to leap over or dart around in their suits. Ana and Storm Shadow hear Snake- Eyes on the roof and drop their windows and lean out and shoot at him. But Snake-Eyes quickly clambers down the side of the vehicle, escaping their shots by disappearing beneath the undercarriage. And that's when Ana sees Duke and Rip following. She sits back down inside and keys a button on a console.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ELS slide open on the outside of the Scarab to reveal two MISSILES, one on each side. They fire. The MISSILES streak back towards Duke and Ripcord. No time to get out of the way, they dive and roll in various directions, extreme kinetic energy hurling them forward. The two missiles whip between them and detonate, one on a PARKING OFFICER'S CAR and the other on a BILLBOARD. The EXPLOSION from the car knocks them down. The Scarab tears away around a corner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They see Snake-Eyes on their monitors in the Brawler.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're turning the corner. Go through that building at 6 o'clock!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke and Ripcord see the building in front of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's no door!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Make one! Duke charges directly at the building. Ripcord reluctantly following as Duke smashes through the wall into...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A crowded bar. Neither of them slow for a second. Duke bolts through. Rip grabs a MARTINI, opens his visor, downs the drink, then places the empty glass on the tray of a stunned waitress. Behind her a sign reads: "DRINK RESPONSIBLY". Duke and Ripcord SMASH through the opposite wall...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .back out onto the city streets where they turn and level their WRIST-MOUNTED ROCKETS at...nothing. A puzzling beat. And then the Scarab thunders up behind them at full speed. Ripcord dives out of the way just in time. Duke has no such luck. He spins and catches the FRONT GRILL, digging his feet into the road in an attempt to slow the Scarab down. But the Scarab now angles towards a busy intersection, threatening to crush DUKE in the criss-crossing traffic. Duke throws himself onto the hood just as an SUV CRASHES into the front grill and is chucked away like so much garbage. Duke tumbles up onto the roof. A PULSE CANNON pops up. Duke dives off the back as the weapon fires. He tumbles to the pavement as Ripcord speeds up to him, firing his WRIST- MOUNTED ROCKETS at the Scarab. Duke fires with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Their rockets nail the Scarab and knock out the PULSE CANNON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! But its armor saves the vehicle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Storm Shadow and Ana are knocked around. Storm Shadow pops a hatch and grabs one of their own ACCELERATOR SUITS. Hands it to Ana.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. McCullen would be quite unhappy if I let you die. Ana quickly and nervously starts to buckle in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How thoughtful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the monitors, Scarlett and Breaker watch the Scarab via Snake-Eyes speeding through the streets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at the moves they're making, they're heading somewhere. Breaker widens the map, plotting a route.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This's their route from the lab. On the screen, they see the lab, the current position of the Scarab, and what lies just ahead. . .the Eiffel Tower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Metal... Oh God...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snake-Eyes is now desperately clinging to the undercarriage. Duke and Rip are catching up behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guys, you have to stop them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, we're working on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean right now. They're going to detonate one of the warheads on the Eiffel Tower. Ripcord glances up and sees the Eiffel Tower looming up fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, man... Under the Scarab, Snake-Eyes pulls out his GLOCK PISTOL and fires into the unprotected insides of the FRONT TIRES, which promptly rip to shreds. The Neo-Viper loses control of the vehicle, SMASHES through a GUARD ARM onto train tracks. Snake-Eyes sees something, lets go, rolls free and crashes into garbage cans just as a METRO TRAIN barrels into the Scarab, which LAUNCHES into the air, hood-over-tailpipe. Duke and Ripcord are running too fast to stop. Duke manages to leap into the air, his boots barely scraping the top of the train while Ripcord covers his face with his hands and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: headlong into a window on the side of the train...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .flying across the aisle, whipping past a group of stunned morning COMMUTERS, and smashing out through the far window...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Scarab, Duke and Rip all CRASH HARD to the pavement and tumble. Sparks and flame and flying metal everywhere. Duke and Rip finally stop tumbling, a hundred yards away from the wreck of the Scarab.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scarlett, Heavy Duty and Breaker see this on their monitors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Holy shit...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You guys okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke and Ripcord's visors lift, both looking a bit wigged.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I went through the train. What happened to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I jumped over it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, you didn't know?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : We see the Neo-Vipers are dead. Storm Shadow is incredibly beat and bloody, but Ana is just fine in her red Accelerator Suit. Storm Shadow grabs the weapons case and he and Ana leap out. Duke and Ripcord pick themselves up while Snake-Eyes crawls out of the TRASH CANS nearby. They see Storm Shadow and Ana emerge from the Scarab and hurry off towards the tower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon! Snake-Eyes follows Duke and Ripcord, charging after them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: swarm around the south base of the tower to buy their tickets and start their tours. Storm Shadow and Ana burst through them, slamming past SECURITY GUARDS as they bound onto the stairs. People scream at the sight of Ana. Duke and Ripcord arrive seconds later, rushing up in their Accelerator Suits like beings from another world. They spot Ana and Storm Shadow on the stairs and hurry after them. The Security Guards draw their pistols and start SHOOTING at Duke and Ripcord. The BULLETS ping off their suits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Duke) How do you say "we're the good guys" in French? Meanwhile, Snake-Eyes evades all the chaos by leaping up under the south base, scaling the iron lattice like a monkey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Ana and Storm Shadow crest the stairs and rudely push through the crowd to the stairway on the opposite side of the floor. Another SECURITY GUARD draws a gun on them but Storm Shadow snatches the weapon out of the man's hands, swatting him with the butt, all without missing a step. The crowd panics and runs screaming for the stairs-- --where Duke and Ripcord are struggling to catch up. The avalanche of tourists slows their progress. Underneath the stairway, however, Snake-Eyes continues to climb fast without a safety net. He makes it to the first floor and races after Ana and Storm Shadow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : The Brawler screeches up. Scarlett's first out with Breaker and Heavy Duty behind her. All of them carrying weapons. The Security Guards instantly go on the defensive as they hurry up to the stairway. Guns go up. Scarlett speaks to them urgently in French.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (French, subtitled) Don't shoot! We're a special anti- terrorist unit! There's a bomb up there!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: are now rushing up behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Ana and Storm Shadow speed over to the main tower ELEVATOR and barge their way inside. Storm Shadow hurls the ELEVATOR OPERATOR out as Ana opens the weapons case and removes one of the NANOTECH WARHEADS and its KILL SWITCH. Through the stunned crowd, they see Snake-Eyes reach the top of the stairs behind. Ana rolls the warhead towards him while Storm Shadow lines up on him with the Security Guard's pistol as if to shoot him. Snake-Eyes glares defiantly at Storm Shadow who just grins and lowers his gun at the warhead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: AND THE WARHEAD EXPLODES. Snake-Eyes recoils.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Everyone hears the warhead detonate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Duke and Ripcord freeze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : A BURST OF NANO-MITES spreads out in all directions. Storm Shadow closes the ELEVATOR DOORS and hits a button for the top. The elevator races upwards as everything else gets eaten by the ravenous NANO-MITES. The floor begins to disappear. Tourists stampede towards the stairs. A LITTLE GIRL is thrown from her MOTHER'S GRIP. The mother screams out for her child as the girl goes over the railing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : a hundred feet up, Duke and Rip see her coming. Ripcord swings out and catches the girl just in time. Above them, the tower is dissolving before their eyes. Duke sees Snake-Eyes being pushed down the stairs by the tourists. He leaps up onto the iron lattice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where you going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Each warhead has a kill switch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's too late! We gotta get off this thing!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those nano-mites will level the entire city! Duke climbs up the side of the tower with his Accelerator Suit. Rip things about following, but then looks at the little girl in his arms, who smiles and hugs him. Snake-Eyes grabs him and they join the flow of people down the stairs. The NANO-MITES chasing them close behind. Below them, Scarlett, Breaker, and Heavy Duty are helping the police evacuate the Tower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Ana and Storm Shadow race to the top.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into mike) Be ready to pick up in thirty seconds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : The Typhoon gunship rockets towards the top of the disintegrating Eiffel Tower, its SIDE DOOR opening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Duke scales the tower, the NANO-MITES chasing him up. His eyes on the elevator as it reaches the top deck just above him. The Typhoon fires a blast of its CONCUSSION CANNONS at Duke, knocking him off the tower. He falls, but manages to catch the tower just below, the NANO-MITES almost on top of him now. The climbs even faster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : The elevator arrives. Ana and Storm Shadow calmly walk out and climb the railing as the Typhoon hovers up beside them. Below them, Duke sees them board. The tower groans and wobbles. It's a long way down. Time has run out. Ana and Storm Shadow jump into the Typhoon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . With the NANO-MITES at his heels, Duke clambers up and jumps up off the side of the Tower, sailing up through the air and latching onto the SIDE DOOR of the Typhoon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : The gunship rocks with his sudden weight. Ana and Storm Shadow almost lose their footing. Duke springs inside. He smacks Storm Shadow down and grabs the KILL SWITCH from Ana, pressing the trigger. Immediately, the NANO-MITES pulse with light and fall to the ground around the Eiffel Tower. The Tower groans, half-eaten, then topples over on its side. Ripcord and Snake-Eyes scurry out of the way as it crashes down onto the Seine, sending up an enormous explosion of water. The shock on the faces of everyone around reverberates through the entire Joe team. Ripcord keeps his eyes on the Typhoon as it pulls away. Breaker suddenly gets an idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! He hauls-ass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana looks at Duke, a pursed smile on her lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You just saved Paris. Storm Shadow is not happy at all, he TASERS Duke, who drops hard to the floor of the Typhoon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A crowd has gathered around the crashed Scarab. Heavy Duty yanks one of the dead Neo-Vipers out. Breaker yanks off the guy's HELMET then removes a needle-like PORT PLUG from his
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Scarlett moves into position to help him. Ripcord kneels down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plugging into his cerebral cortex. With a SICKENING CRUNCH, Breaker plunges the needle into the top of the Neo-Viper's head. Ripcord winces at the sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The brain survives for a couple of minutes after death. We can read his most recent memories.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you find Duke?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If this guy remembers the way home we can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : A FLASH OF MEMORIES appearing on Breaker's HUD. Duke shooting him in the face, racing along the highway, driving the ARMORED CAR. As the images continue, we PUSH IN on the Neo-Viper's open eyes and CUT TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McCullen watching Breaker and Ripcord through the dead Neo- Viper's eyes on a screen. He turns to the Doctor urgently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Destroy that unit immediately. The Doctor removes his PDA and taps a key to draw up the Neo- Viper's file. He clicks a button that reads "TERMINATE".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Instantly, the Neo-Viper's body snaps rigid and begins to shake. Everyone gets a shock. Backing up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's still alive!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's not alive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ever seen a dead guy do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They activated a self-destruct. The Neo-Viper's body starts to decay before them. Thousands of NANO-MITES literally eating away at his flesh and bones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nano-mites!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're eating him!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hurry, Breaker! But the NANO-MITES are too fast. The Neo-Viper's legs are now gone. His chest and arms next. Breaker rapidly scans through the MEMORY FLASHES. But now the NANO-MITES consume his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTROL ROOM - MARS HEADQUARTERS - DAY McCullen watches Breaker's frantic face suddenly disappear on his screen. He gives the Doctor a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Breaker looks crestfallen at the empty Neo-Viper suit in his arms. Ripcord kneels beside him, stunned and bereft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did the best you could.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Relax, I got it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got it? (CONFUSED) Well, what was the "NOO!" for?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was for McCullen. There is the sound of weapons being raised. The team looks to see they are surrounded by FRENCH POLICE and PARATROOPERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in French) Put your hands in the air! The Joes trade looks, shrug and raise their hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (under his breath) We don't have time for this.
direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction
