direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : A him down hard. The Joes sit alone FRENCH POLICE HOLDING CEL L - DUSK who bears some bruisbenches. Heavy fight.DutY stares at Ripcord,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It'snot his emotional. fault. He's just... Scarlett and a French Detect Rip share a look. On the other
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: o curiously examines n a desk. Bre aker jumps up to Breakerssde Rf the bars the bars. Please, BREAKER touch that. Please, don't
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: touching It's very... Okayit. , Please! Sir. Sir, How do RIPCORD you say "lawyer" in French?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we could get on a Might be to computer we longitude able Input the partial les g es latitude, and Viper, figu the downloaded from tha t re out their locati
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Ripcord) It'll be a military when they're done tribunal. need a lawyer. We with us And 'll need diapers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to himself) Think, think, think... (to the Joes) At some point they gotta feed us or take us out for the interrogation. When they do I'll jump the lead Guard. Heavy, you go for his weapon and--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --Start an international incident.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not gonna just sit here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is bigger than Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if it was one of you? What if they had Heavy or Scarlett, what would you do? The Joes trade looks - rock and a hard place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're not doing Duke a damned bit of good sitting here. If it was reversed, Duke would be kicking down every door between here and the freakin' moon 'til he found me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And we'll do the same for him as soon as we get out of here. She has a thought and turns to Breaker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Partial? You said partial latitude and longitude.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We only got the one coordinate-- 90 degrees, then the image went to snow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe it was the whole coordinate, just 90 degrees latitude. (they all look at her) (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Before the image went to snow,...it's the polar ice cap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: hit the floor and slide to his feet. The Joes all look up to see several POLICE OFFICIALS looking at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Joes are led down a hallway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They did away with the guillotine, right? They arrive at a door. The door is opened to reveal a man in a wheelchair, back turned. When he spins around, it's Hawk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: General! Hawk just shakes his head and sighs heavily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Joes sit around the General, mid-discussion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long before we're released?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The French government is allowing you to leave on the condition that none of you ever return. Other agencies will be handling this from here on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The heads of state of every member of GI JOE are recalling their operatives. We are now considered a rogue unit, uncontrollable. Shut down. We're to report to Washington for debriefing. Hawk rolls his wheelchair to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it? They've got Duke!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Hawk stops his wheelchair, turns to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said you were to report to Washington. I didn't say when, or which route to take.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe a northern one. Hawk smiles and wheels out the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rockets through the orange skies, SMASHING through the sound barrier with an ear-tingling SONIC BOOM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Storm Shadow sits in a meditative state. Duke is shackled, hands bound, out of his ACCELERATOR SUIT. Ana steps out of the cockpit area and approaches him, nods to Storm Shadow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He thinks I should kill you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: James wants to meet you in person.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: James?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr McCullen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana listen--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --Talk softly, or he'll tazer you again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (raises his bound hands) Loosen these, he'll never taser anything again. She taps the bonds on his wrists.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I should've thought of this before. They almost share a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me get this straight. You're with McCullen. You're married to that Baron. And you claim you're still in love with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a complex woman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you just don't know who you are anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who I was died long ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, this isn't you, I still see the person I loved behind your eyes. Her eyes soften for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me what she was like.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She was smart, and funny. She was loyal as hell. She loved those she was close with, me, her brother... (agonized pause) I did my best. With Rex. I'm sorry. He was my responsibility. I should have... It's why I left, Ana. Why I couldn't be with you. You were in so much pain... I thought the sight of me just give you more. She seems to be affected by this ever so slightly, then... a hard, cold look comes to her eyes, she shakes her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It doesn't matter now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it matters very much. We have the chance to make things right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing will ever be right again. Duke stares at her, his heart ripped apart. WE PUSH IN ON the two of them and FLASHBACK TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .C. - FLASHBACK - DAY Rain is drizzling on a military cemetery. Ana sits alone, without family, without Duke, staring straight ahead as Rex's casket is lowered into the ground. Parked on a nearby road is a lone car. Duke sits inside it, staring at the funeral in the distance. His face tells us the anguish he's living with. He pulls out and starts to drive away, the rain on the windshield BLURS AS WE DISSOLVE TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Night Raven zeroes down on a stretch of ice near a huge
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A SET OF RUNWAY LIGHTS appear under the ice, guiding it in for a smooth landing. The cave swallows the plane whole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Night Raven rolls to a stop inside the cave. The side door opens. Storm Shadow exits with the weapons case. Ana leads Duke out, two Neo-Vipers behind them. Storm Shadow clicks a hand held remote and a HIDDEN ICE WALL opens to reveal a HI-TECH DIVING BELL awaiting them. Duke uses the moment to lunge forward, grab the case and haul ass towards the cave door. Storm Shadow spins, Shurikan throwing stars in his hands. The Neo-Vipers whip up their pulse rifles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! McCullen has plans for him! Storm Shadow throws a star, it whistles across the cave and nails Duke in his shoulder, Duke goes down hard, staggers back up, but the Neo-Vipers are already on him, they start beating the living shit out of him. Ana jogs up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enough! Storm Shadow picks up the case and looks at Duke, face down, bloody and beaten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what was your plan? Run three thousand miles across the ice? He rips his star out of Duke's shoulder. Duke sucks it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stupid soldier. Duke rolls over and stares up at them, breathing hard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ripcord, Scarlett, Snake-Eyes, Heavy Duty and Breaker are in the conn tower of a next-gen submarine, going over a 3-D MAP of the polar ice cap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's a lotta ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's gonna be like trying to find whale spit in the ocean. Breaker sees a SMALL LIGHT flashing on his Ball-Eyepiece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's strange.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When they stole the weapons case, I set my suit to scan for the tracker beacon in case it came back on, and it just came back on. Ripcord just smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's my boy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The DIVING BELL comes shooting down out of a shaft in the bottom of the ice cap and rockets down towards the facility.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the diving bell descends, Duke stares at the facility out the portal. He is awed by the immense size of the place, he looks at Ana, proud of her office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Certain work needs to be done away from the public eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The diving bell entry port opens, guarded by two Neo-Vipers. McCullen stands waiting. His eyes first move to the weapons case in Storm Shadow's hands. Storm Shadow opens it and shows him the three remaining warheads. McCullen runs his fingers over them, then nods, Storm Shadow closes the case.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take them to the drones. I want them ready to launch in one hour.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It will be done. And only then does McCullen greet Ana.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My beautiful Lady of the Lake... He kisses her. Ana kisses him back with slightly-feigned affection, her eyes open and on Duke. Duke stands there, impassive. McCullen finishes the kiss and turns to Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This bother you? Duke says nothing, so McCullen steps closer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Isn't it funny, with the entire balance of power in the world about to shift, a couple of guys can still have a stare down over who gets the girl. Duke takes the opportunity to HEAD BUTT McCullen. The Neo- Vipers instantly pummel Duke to the floor. McCullen wipes a small trickle of blood from his nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The interesting thing about my Neo- Vipers is they still think the same thoughts they always did, they just can't act on them anymore. Instead, they do what I want. I imagine that must be very frustrating. He gets right down in Duke's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to make you very unhappy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grit teeth) I'm already happy. McCullen glances at Ana, watching the display with conflicted eyes. McCullen heads for the door, beckoning the Neo-Vipers to make Duke follow him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke trails behind McCullen and Ana, flanked by Neo-Vipers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're you gonna do with the warheads?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You take to your training well, that's good. Still trying to develop information. Still planning to escape and stope me. Moments from now, you'll see that won't ever happen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then you won't mind telling me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Isn't it clear? I'm a business man. I'm going to use them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Millions of people are gonna die if you launch those warheads. What is it you want, McCullen?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Merely to strike fear into the hearts of every man, woman, and child on the planet. Only then will they look up to the man who wields the most power, and obey him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The control room is alive with TECHNICIANS squirreling about various stations. Monitors show three large AERIAL DRONES sitting in vertical launch bays. Duke sees the drones and his face registers the horror of what McCullen's about to do. He glances at Ana, she quietly looks away, a hint of remorse in her eyes? The Doctor rises to greet McCullen, glancing at Duke for several moments, as if struck by the sight of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meet the genius behind all my nanotechnology.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My genius lies only in taking what others created to the logical next steps. All modern gains in science are made through theft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll have to excuse his modesty, when I found him, he was -- THE DOCTOR (interrupting, re: Duke) --Another "recruit"?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Albeit a rather unwilling one. The Doctor's nano-mites can control all manner of brain functions. When you wake up, you'll be working for me, and your past will be a distant shimmer that floats in and out of your mind like a leaf on a breeze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll prepare him for the surgery. The Doctor beckons the Neo-Vipers who shove Duke after him towards another door. Duke and Ana exchange one last look. McCullen keeps his eyes on her as she watches him go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A school of fish swims past the facility, one fish breaks away from the school. CAMERA ZOOMS IN TIGHT ON IT: it's not a fish at all, but a mini robotic underwater spy system.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A sleek submarine drifts silently through the arctic waters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) Picture's coming on line now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the Conn Tower of the sub, our team gathers around Breaker who sits at a monitor watching what the "fish" is watching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's an underwater facility...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McCullen's home away from home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dukes' gotta be in there somewhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, what's that? Breaker ZOOMS IN on a massive TURBO-LASER CANNON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Jesus...That's an automated, phased array turbo-pulse battery. (off their looks) A really big gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could it take out our sub?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That thing could take out a dozen subs simultaneously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then that's our first objective.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no. Duke's our first objective.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The main force can't attack as long as that cannon's online.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How you figure getting it offline? Snake-Eyes points to the DIVING BELL CABLES n the monitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elevator cables. They've got a surface entrance. Shipwreck? She turns to the submarine commander, HECTOR "SHIPWRECK" DELGADO, a fiery Spanish naval combat veteran.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Going up, senorita? Scarlett nods and leads the others down a corridor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snake-Eyes, Breaker, Ripcord, and I will infiltrate the factory from above and destroy the cannon. Heavy
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as soon as we give the word, you lead the assault from outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (nods grimly) Go, Joes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A quiet wind blows across a remote stretch of arctic ice. All of a sudden the ice pack begins to tremble like the mother of all earthquakes. It cracks and ruptures and then erupts as the CONN TOWER of the submarine crashes through, then grinds to a halt. A FORWARD HATCH OPENS and two ROCK SLIDES launch out, landing hard on the ice and speeding away. Ripcord and Breaker on one. Scarlett and Snake-Eyes on the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McCullen, Ana, and Storm Shadow watch monitors showing
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: securing the warheads onto three rocket propelled
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . As the last one is secured a Technician says:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All drones prepared and ready, Sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good, commence the launch sequence immediately. is that a ripple of concern flickering across Ana's face?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our team races into the ice cave on their ROCK SLIDES and park beside the dormant Night Raven. Weapons up. Scanning the place from top to bottom. Ripcord stars at the awesome plane towering before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That McCullen's got some gadgets. Breaker gestures to the ice wall. Snake-Eyes uses his Katana sword to slice a circle in the wall and yank it out, revealing the DIVING BELL CABLES, but no diving bell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe we could slide down. Snake-Eyes shakes his head, doubtful
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The arctic water would kill us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McCullen, Ana, and Storm Shadow watch the drones sitting in the launch bays on the screens. Technicians are working hard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three... two... one... ignite primary engines. The entire control room begins to shake. The screens fill with fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Joes run outside, wondering what the hell is causing the earthquake. A large circle of ice near them MELTS. And then the first drone EXPLODES UP before them and LAUNCHES into the morning sky, peeling away to the east. Before they can react, the second drone EXPLODES UP a hundred yards away, peeling off to the west. They hear the third one about to rocket up--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Snake-Eyes thinks fast, sprints into the cave, jumps on a Rock Slide, hauls-ass outside, hits a WEAPONS SWITCH on his Rock Slide, prepping two HEAT-SEEKING ROCKETS on either side of the vehicle. The third drone LAUNCHES UP from two hundred yards away. Snake-Eyes locks onto its exhaust and FIRES. The missiles race up after the drone and knock it out of the sky. It EXPLODES. Metal FLIES. Snow BURNS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The technicians see this on their monitors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We lost one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lost one? What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bird Three is down, Sir. McCullen looks at the monitors, enraged. Storm Shadow smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're under attack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alert all defences. Charge up the pulse cannon. He turns to say something to Ana, but she has left the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Topside, the team watches the two remaining drones race away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about the other two?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We find the kill switches and short out the nano-mites.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shakes his head) They're already way out of range.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then somebody has to go up there and shoot those things down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ripcord climbs into the Night Raven's cockpit. Scarlett steps up to watch. He's already flipping switches and putting on a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you even fly this thing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can fly anything. You just track those warheads and guide me in. We don't have long until they hit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ripcord? He glances at her, a moment between them. Then she presses forward and kisses him on the mouth. He stares back at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good luck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do me a favor? Save Duke. She gives him a nod, then leaves. Ripcord grins to himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The NIGHT RAVEN tears across the ice and launches into the sky. Ripcord WHOOPS with adrenaline. Scarlett, Snake-Eyes, and Breaker fast rope down into the first launch bay as the ice REFORMS behind them, hiding the hole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We now find Duke, wearing only SURGICAL TROUSERS, strapped on the operating gurney we saw Zartan on earlier. The SMART ROBOTS warming up around him as the Doctor approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The atomic bomb that was dropped on Hiroshima destroyed seventy percent of the city. Seventy percent... Did you know that, Duke?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Duke looks at him, something familiar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There was a bank situated less than one hundred yards from Ground Zero, destroyed of course. Only one thing survived. It's four bank vaults. And when those vaults were opened, they discovered everything inside them had survived completely unscathed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course, the vault I took shelter in wasn't that well-made. He unclips his BREATHING TUBES and lowers the mask to reveal a scarred and burned face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Double Bubble? Duke is beyond shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rex... Rex immediately has trouble breathing and returns the mask over his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sonuvabitch... Ana buried you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A moving ceremony, I'm sure. The three volley salute. The flag on the coffin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why? .Why didn't you come in...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because I found out the truth...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : JUNGLE BUILDING - DAY Rex moves through the building with Fireteam Bravo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Intel says the lab's in the basement. Fireteam Bravo kicks open a door. They lead the way down a staircase toward the basement. Rex follows, nervous as hell. The soldiers round a corner, suddenly, Rex hears GUNFIRE, he freezes, then silence, Rex pulls out his .45 And rounds the corner to see Fireteam Bravo down. A GUARD is trying to clear a jam in his machine gun. As he clears the weapon and raises it, Rex raises his .45 and fires first. The Guard drops. Rex checks Bravo, but they're not moving. He looks around the basement, no lab, but he sees a massive VAULT DOOR, closed. He heads for the vault, 45 raised, breathing hard. WHOOSH, a blast of refrigerated air hits him as he opens the door. Rex enters a small room filled with DEAD ANIMALS in huge
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: > Something inside the animals is constantly reshaping their appearances, reforming their facial bones and changing the color, texture and elasticity of their skins. There is a scuffling noise, Rex points his gun. A small, stooped old SCIENTIST in a lab coat appears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you going to shoot me?... Rex doesn't respond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We knew you were coming. But I couldn't walk away from it... Rex stares in awe, not what he was expecting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay where you are. His gun up, he finds a COMPUTER TERMINAL and begins accessing various files, starts reading them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These aren't chemical or nuclear--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Something much... better.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is beyond anything... This is light years ahead of anyone in the field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You see why I couldn't leave. Rex nods, hypnotized by the science in front of him, an instant bond formed with the man who created it. The distant sound of Jets. The Scientist moves to the vault door and begins pulling it closed as we hear the J-Dam Bunker Buster whistling towards them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we live, I'll show you everything...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke tries to absorb what he's learned. The Doctor continues.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: WE SMASH CUT BACK TO THE MEDICAL WING

direction.raw_text: The man who created this technology was not our enemy. In fact, he was hired by our very own government to create it. When it was deemed too unethical, they sent us to kill him. He didn't survive the blast. But I... lived. (touches his face) And I escaped with his research. Unfortunately I tested it on myself first, and lost my lungs and vocal chords in the process. But now I've perfected it, and you will get a first-hand experience.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (his biggest concern) Does Ana know about this, about you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... and she never will. He glances at the SMART ROBOTS and Duke realizes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sick bastard... you did this to your own sister?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I loved my sister! Do you have any idea the state she was in? Me dead. You AWOL. Depression, drugs. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, I had her brought here, gave her a way to deal with her pain, gave her purpose. Made her strong. I gave her a new life, Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why work for McCullen?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He saved my life, for starters. Now to mention infinite resources to work in the field of my choosing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's bullshit. You could have had any job you wanted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't want any job. You can't play nice with science, Duke. It's sometimes necessary to experiment, to fail, even to destroy to attain a goal. It's a fact that McCullen has the guts to embrace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (still shocked) Everything she's done, everything she's become, started because she thought you died that day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And because you then abandoned her, let's not forget that part. And with that, he leaves Duke to the SMART ROBOTS, which menacingly begin to move in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scarlett, Snake-Eyes, and Breaker drop down into the launch bay. They see a chrome corridor leading into the facility.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's pressure plated and laser protected. Anyway around it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Any object larger than a quarter will fry your britches. Snake-Eyes shakes his head with a sigh, then steps forward and leaps onto the floor, landing on his fingertips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Then, with incredible strength, he proceeds to walk across the floor on his fingertips, aware of the continuous crackle and hum of lasers around him. Scarlett and Breaker watch with baited breath. Snake- Eyes now reaches the doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What you'll have to do is rewire the laser panel's brain by-- --Snake-Eyes swiftly balances on one set of fingertips while his other fingers grab his sword and STAB the laser panel. The sound of the laser net instantly vanishes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .or you cold just stab it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke lies on the operating table as a SMART ROBOT makes an incision behind his right ear. Duke grimaces. A long needle zeroes in on the incision. As the needle dives towards Duke's head, a hand hits a switch and the needle quickly retracts. Duke looks over to see Ana by the controls, gazing at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have much time. She rushes over and unties him and they stare at each other, then kiss passionately. All of a sudden, Duke feels something behind her right ear, he turns her head, --an INCISION SCAR. He looks at her, but before he can say anything, Ana's body snaps rigid and falls limp in his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ana! Duke looks over to see the Doctor holding his PDA, McCullen and two Neo-Vipers beside him, their rifles on Duke and Ana. Duke gazes at Ana, desperately feeling for her pulse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two TECHNICIANS man the firing controls of the huge TURBO LASER CANNON. Snake-Eyes takes them out and shuts down the cannon. HE sends a quick message on his WRIST-COMMUNICATOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heavy Duty sees the message appear on a screen. "CANNON OFF- LINE. HAVE A NICE DAY." Heavy smiles and turns to Shipwreck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get in this fight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . UNDERWATER - DAY The GI JOE submarine peels around a rocky headland now, in full view of the underwater facility. A series of TORPEDOES fire out of the submarine's launch tubes. Most are blown up by the facility's Harpoon Cannon defenses, but several manage to hit the facility's exterior. KA-BOOM!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The whole place SHUDDERS. Scarlett and Breaker blow the control room door and cut down the Technicians trying to shoot them. Breaker takes over a station console.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, I've got a lock on the two remaining warheads. Target one is Moscow! Target Two is Washington!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give Ripcord the coordinates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snake-Eyes spins to see a pair of KATANA BLADES come crashing down at him from behind. He spins, but one of the blades cuts him on his left arm, sending him reeling backwards, it's Storm Shadow. Who quickly powers the laser cannon back online. Snake-Eyes dives to stop him, --and as their swords meet WE FLASH CUT TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: where two sixteen year- olds, Snake-Eyes and Storm Shadow, trade blows with wooden katanas. Storm Shadow drops Snake-Eyes, who falls hard, Storm Shadow steps on his throat, sword point in Snake- Eyes' face. Hard Master looks on without expression. FLASH CUT BACK TO:
direction.name: direction

result.heading: THE GROUNDS OF THE ARISHIKAGE TEMPLE,

direction.raw_text: where Snake-Eyes and Storm Shadow's blades flash like lightning, they battle fiercely around the room. A Neo-Viper charges up the controls. Snake can't stop him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . UNDERWATER - DAY Outside, the massive TURBO-LASER swings wildly towards the submarine and fires. A BRILLIANT BLUE PULSE ripples through the arctic sea, glancing the side of the vessel. WHAM!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The submarine shakes hard. Rivets burst. Water pours in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hull's been ruptured!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone into the attack boats!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hatches open along the sides of the submarine, deploying ten
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: carrying dozens of Joes. At the same time, batches begin to open on the facility and a dozen MANTIS attack craft carrying dozens of Neo-Vipers emerge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heavy Duty and Shipwreck pilot one of the SHARCS. The huge opposing force coming at them is quite terrifying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep tight everybody. He fires a HARPOON TORPEDO which BLASTS a Mantis. The mantis craft RETURN FIRE. The whole area explodes in a pulse fire and harpoon blasts. The Joe submarine sinks and EXPLODES at the base of the facility.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duke cuddles dead Ana, clearly emotional. McCullen steps up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is she still alive?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You said this couldn't happen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't think it could. I've never seen anyone defeat the programming, even momentarily. Duke recovers and angrily grabs one of Ana's PISTOLS and kills the two Neo-Vipers, then turns the gun on the others. The Doctor lifts his PDA, finger on the "TERMINATE" BUTTON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I press this, Ana dies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put it down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your choice, Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put it down! The Doctor doesn't move. McCullen watches the stand-off his right hand discreetly drawing STEEL HOSE out from his sleeve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ripcord streaks into the upper atmosphere in the Night Raven, the curve of the Earth visible out his windows. Ahead, he can see a PULSATING LIGHT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see it, dead ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Breaker speaks into his headset.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have to knock it down before it re-enters the atmosphere so the nano-mites don't reach the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ripcord flicks a switch and opens a PULSE LASER on the nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, I've got a problem. The fire controls are not in here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean, not in there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean I can't see them anywhere!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scarlett hears this and realizes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's gotta be voice-activated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have to say the words into your flight helmet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ripcord lines up the missile in his sights, gets a lock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fire! (nothing happens) Shoot! (still nothing) Blast away! Still nothing, the missile streaking onwards towards the Earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They hear Ripcord yelling over the speakers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing's happening!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Must be a different language.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Ripcord) Try "teine".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Scottish for fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ripcord's not sure about this, the missile arcing down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Teine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen to my voice, "Teine".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Teine! Teine! Teine! (nothing happens) It's not working!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's because you're not saying it right!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How many different ways you want me to say it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One way! The right way! Teine!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Teine! And at last the PULSE LASER fires. Blasting the missile out of the sky. The CLOUD OF NANO-MITES floats aimlessly away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They all see the missile disappear on their screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice work, Ace. You just saved Moscow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ripcord sighs with relief, already peeling away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just doing my job. Guide me to the other drone... (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (under his breath) .man, I freakin' saved Moscow!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The White House glistens in the midday sun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The American President's Bodyguards rush him and his staff down into a fortified bunker beneath the White House.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How soon will it strike the city?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seventeen minutes, Sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This will be a disaster the likes of which we have never seen. As the DOORS CLOSE behind them we see the MARS INDUSTRIES LOGO on the doors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . UNDERWATER - DAY Another blast from the TURBO-LASER destroys a SHARC.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heavy Duty sees this as he takes out a MANTIS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That cannon's going to kill us all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My guy will take care of it, trust me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snake-Eyes kills the Neo-Viper, who falls down a large shaft into freezing waters. Storm Shadow lunges at Snake-Eyes and the two of them tumble down into the shaft, but land on a gangway. They both leap up and begin to fight again. The Neo- Viper tries to crawl out of the freezing water, seemingly unfazed as he slowly freezes solid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . All of a sudden, there's LOUD NOISES and a series of ENERGY LASERS power on up and down the shaft between various circuit modules. This is where the energy is charged to operate the cannon. One of the lasers catches Storm Shadow's shoulder and burns him severely. Snake-Eyes sees this and ducks just as an
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fires on beside his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . UNDERWATER - DAY Outside, the TURBO-LASER fires. The Joe craft desperately weave and dodge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .and the LASER NET fades. Instantly, Storm Shadow and Snake- Eyes continue their desperate fight. Swords FLASH and CLANG, two masters at their best. AND WE FLASH CUT TO:
direction.name: direction

result.heading: AND WE FLASH CUT BACK TO

direction.raw_text: where two twenty-two year olds, Storm Shadow and Snake-Eyes sword fight. Storm Shadow knocks Snake-Eyes to the ground again and places his steel sword against Snake-Eyes' face. Again, Hard Master watches without expression. AND WE FLASH CUT BACK TO:
direction.name: direction

result.heading: THE GROUNDS OF THE ARISHIKAGE TEMPLE,

direction.raw_text: where Storm Shadow slashes Snake-Eyes across the chest, but before he can finish him off, the cannon charges up again and the LASER NET slams on. Storm Shadow twists his body to avoid the ENERGY LASERS while Snake- Eyes lifts himself up to his toes to avoid a laser that threatens to disintegrate his crotch. Storm Shadow sees this, grins to himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A staffer is on the phone, looking up at the President.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It seems somebody's shot down the warhead heading for Moscow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank God... As he says this, a SECRET SERVICE AGENT draws a SILENCED PISTOL and kills the other Agents and Staff. We see an
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: behind his right ear and realize he is a Neo- Viper. The President stares, stunned and horrified. The Neo- Viper holds his pistol on the President as--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: moves on the wall, revealing a secret room. An
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: emerges and the President stares in shock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Up in the skies, Ripcord spots the second drone rocketing down towards the lower atmosphere in front of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Second drone in my sights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Breaker and Scarlett watch in the control room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hurry, Rip. You've only got thirty seconds before it enters the lower atmosphere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ripcord's feeling the pressure. He targets the missile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Taine! But nothing happens. Scarlett's voice yells in his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Teine! Teine!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't yell at me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Teine. Ripcord takes a breath, stealing his nerves. A RED FUEL LIGHT starts beeping on his control board. Rip does his best to ignore it, focusing on the missile as it begins to disappear into the lower atmosphere. The light beats faster and louder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Teine! The LASER PULSE fires, blasting straight at the missile which is lost in the atmospheric haze below. For a moment, he can't tell if he hit it or not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The tracking in the control room provides the answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You missed! The warhead has entered the lower atmosphere!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ripcord realizes this as he enters the lower atmosphere himself. The spread of WASHINGTON D.C. Far below him now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the operating chamber, the stand-off reaches its boiling point now. McCullen slowly approaching Duke who keeps Ana's pistol on the Doctor, Ana still in Duke's arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you think she loved you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay back!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you imagine your life with her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said stay back!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you know you've lost, Duke?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All I know is that neither of you deserves her. McCullen suddenly lifts the STEEL HOSE in his right hand--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: tears out at Duke who reflexively fires the PULSE PISTOL at it. The intense air blast from the pulse pistol catches the flames midway between them and blows them back onto McCullen. McCullen SCREAMS as his face is literally burned off. The Doctor freaks and drops the PDA, then yanks McCullen out into the corridor. Duke fires after them, then grabs the PDA, removing Ana's screen with a sigh of relief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Above Washington, Ripcord guns his aircraft after the falling drone. Getting real close this time. No way he can miss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They see this on the screens in the control room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're too close, Rip. Back up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ripcord gets eerily calm all of a sudden.
direction.name: direction
